name: Stradom House, Autograph Collection
description: Stradom House Autograph Collection is housed in an outstanding historical building in Krakow, situated between the Royal castle and the Jewish district. The 125 guestrooms Hotel is a perfect spot to explore the bustling city, surrounded by local attractions, and tailored made experiences. The chic destination is offering a blend of Polish modernism and original historical details. Travellers unwind themselves at Sol SPA, the contemporary Wellness center, including a state-of-the-art Fitness, exclusive wet facilities and an Indoor lap pool. Gourmet traveller's are delighted with an elegant seafood restaurant, John Dory. The guests will experience an upscale eatery, Gaia inspired by the Mediterranean countries cuisine, where the lively atmosphere sets the stage. Hedwig’s Club introduces a world-class bar and a wine cellar in a spectacular converted chapel. This is a Lifestyle venue assembled, transformed and prepared to be a one-of-a-kind experience.Marriott

name: Crown Krakow - Handwritten Collection
description: Contemporary elegance inspired by Art Deco in 1923 tenement house. Hotel has 44 rooms: Classic, Junior Suite, Classic Suite and Royal Suite, restaurant, Bar and Cigar, conference room and fitness. Crown Hotel will take you from threshold to an era that is associated with refinement, elegance and chic. Interwar period shows not only in façade of building, but also in interiors and exceptional works of art.accorhotels.com

name: Metropolitan Boutique Hotel
description: Situated right by Kraków’s historical Jewish Quarter of Kazimierz, Metropolitan Boutique Hotel is less than 1 km from the Old Town and the Wawel Royal Castle. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a fitness centre, and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The rooms feature modern design and are decorated in subdued colours. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with seasonal underfloor heating. Guests can relax in the lobby bar and enjoy a meal in the on-site restaurant offering Polish and European cuisine. In the mornings buffet breakfast is served. Metropolitan Boutique is located 1.5 km from Kraków Główny Railway Station and from Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre. The hotel can provide shuttle services from the John Paul II International Airport Kraków-Balice, 12.6 km away.

name: Campanile Krakow South
description: Featuring a bar, Campanile Krakow South is located in Kraków in the Lesser Poland region, 4.7 km from Wawel Royal Castle and 5.2 km from National Museum of Krakow. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Campanile Krakow South every room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Speaking English and Polish, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Town Hall Tower is 5.2 km from Campanile Krakow South, while Main Market Square is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Plantonia Aparthotel
description: Set in Kraków, 800 metres from Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium and 1.7 km from the centre, PLANTONIA Aparthotel offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Featuring a kitchenette with a fridge and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa bed. A dishwasher, a microwave and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. A vegan breakfast is available every morning at the aparthotel. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near PLANTONIA Aparthotel include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sheraton Grand Krakow
description: A 5-star experience providing guests with Krakow’s best views. Located at the foot of The Royal Wawel Castle, on the banks of the Wisla River, Sheraton Grand Krakow is steps away from Krakow Cathedral, Main Market Square and Kazimierz district, but also close to the shopping areas and Krakow's conference center. Fully renovated Lobby and Atrium will inspire you and the recently opened Anima Restaurant will deliver extraordinary Italian culinary experience. Sport fans can enjoy live transmissions in our SomePlace Else sports bar. Our famous Roof Top Terrace with amazing views is the best place to enjoy refreshing cocktails. Our 232 airy, fully renovated family guest rooms and suites connect with what you love the most: smart TV with a wide range of channels, in-room dining, High-Speed Internet, and the unique comfort of the Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience bed. Swim laps in our heated indoor pool or workout at our Sheraton Fitness. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes pets for a fee.Marriott

name: Hotel Kossak
description: Hotel Kossak is located in the centre of Kraków in a picturesque area, near Vistula River, just 500 metres from Wawel Castle, offering rooms with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. The hotel also has a 24-h fitness centre and a sauna. The rooms offer views of the castle and the river. All guestrooms feature a seating area, an LCD TV and a bathroom with a heated mirror. Guests can enjoy the panoramic view of Kraków from the hotel's restaurant. Hotel Kossak offers 24/7 front desk. The hotel’s staff is available for guests who wish to plan a local excursion. The Main Market Square is just a 10-minute walk away from the property.

name: Old Town Residence - Premium Aparthotel
description: Set in Kraków, 200 metres from the centre and 300 metres from Lost Souls Alley, Old Town Residence - Premium Aparthotel offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the apartment include St. Mary's Basilica, St. Florian's Gate and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Old Town Residence - Premium Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Art Boutique
description: Located in Kraków, less than 1 km from National Museum of Krakow and 700 metres from the centre, Art Boutique provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with slippers, a hair dryer and shower. A fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a kettle. Art Boutique offers a terrace. A a baby safety gate is also available for guests at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Art Boutique include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: G12 Aparthotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 400 metres from the centre and 300 metres from St. Mary's Basilica, G12 Aparthotel features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the apartment. Popular points of interest near G12 Aparthotel include Lost Souls Alley, St. Florian's Gate and Wawel Royal Castle. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Alexander I
description: Located 550 metres from Kraków’s Old Town, Hotel Alexander offers rooms in three standards: Business, Standard and Premium with classical décor and wooden furniture. The rooms provide heating and air-conditioning, work desk, free internet connection, satellite TV, a minibar, an electric kettle, as well as tea and coffe making facilities. Every bathroom has a hairdryer and shower. Children are welcome to the game room. The staff speaks Polish and English. In the Old Town’s Main Market located 500 m from Hotel Alexander there is the St Mary’s Basilica, Cloth Hall, and the Czartoryski Museum. Wawel Castle is 1.2 km away. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre and Kraków Główny Railway Station are both within 1 km from the hotel.

name: Garamond, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: Write your own story by staying at the first in Poland, The Tribute Portfolio Hotel. We will welcome our guests with an unusual history - the building in which the hotel is located dates back to 1938. In the current 53 rooms, once the editorial office of Poland's most popular daily newspaper, the Ilustrowany Kuryer Codzienny, had its headquarters here at the time. At every step you will encounter references to this extraordinary history. Vibrant interiors in art déco style, taking us back to the inter-war period, are just a fraction of the soul we want to present. The hotel's location is just perfect for discovering the corners of the old town. A few steps from the Market Square, a few steps from the railway station. The entire city is at your fingertips. Type us on your Bucket List, definitely in Garamond font.Marriott

name: Hotel Krupnicza 30
description: Well set in Kraków, Hotel Krupnicza 30 provides a Full English/Irish breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 600 metres from National Museum of Krakow. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Krupnicza 30 every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from Hotel Krupnicza 30, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Globtroter Guest House
description: No description found

name: Dada Premium Aparthotel
description: No description found

name: Old Market Residence
description: Situated in Kraków, 500 metres from St. Florian's Gate and 600 metres from the centre, Old Market Residence features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a restaurant. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Krakow Central Railway Station, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Old Market Residence, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco
description: Conveniently situated in Kraków, Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Speaking English, Italian and Polish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco include Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hyatt Place Krakow
description: No description found

name: Hotel Krakus
description: Krakus Hotel is situated in Podgorze district of Krakow, near Vistula River, about 4 kilometres from the Old Town. It offers rooms with bathrooms, TVs, telephones and free Wi-Fi. During your stay you can visit the hotel restaurant, serving traditional Polish and international cuisine. The on-site bar boasts a large selection of alcohols. Krakus Hotel features also 24/7 front desk, meeting facilities and a laundry. There also is a gift shop at the hotel, which also provides a luggage storage service. Guest can also get tourist information directly at the Krakus. The Chembudowa Fair Centre and Kraków Fair are both within 1 km and can be easily reached with municipal transport.

name: Hotel Stary
description: The luxurious Hotel Stary is located in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town. It features a seasonal Sky Bar, located on a rooftop terrace and featuring a view of the Main Market and a picturesque panorama of the Old Town. Guests of the hotel have free access to the on-site spa, which includes a sauna, gym, and a steam bath. In addition, 2 swimming pools with swim jets are available. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Stary have bathrooms with a bathtub and shower. Plasma TVs with satellite channels are also available in every room. Some rooms have a balcony. It offers free internet, mineral water and newspapers. It is possible to enjoy a massage or a treatment in the wellness & spa centre, at a surcharge and upon prior request. In the morning guests can enjoy a traditional Polish breakfast. The Trzy Rybki restaurant serves traditional Polish dishes. In addition, the hotel also has a bar, café and a club. Hotel Stary is 1.1 km from the Wawel Castle. The old Jewish district, Kazimierz is 1 km away. Kraków Główny Train Station and Galeria Krakowska shopping centre are also 1 km from the hotel.

name: No.23 Premium Aparthotel
description: Centrally located, No 23 Aparthotel allows for easy access to Krakow's main sightseeing and retail areas. Just a short walk from National Museum Krakow, it provides comfortable apartments equipped with tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and an in-room safe. This 4-star property offers a concierge, massage services and a 24-hour reception. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer local information. No 23 Aparthotel offers apartments equipped with a hair dryer and cable/satellite channels. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at No 23 Aparthotel, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. Krakow's attractions, such as Historical Museum of Krakow and Main Market Square, are within easy walking distance of the property. Guests can also visit Wawel Royal Castle and Wawel Cathedral.HotelsCombined

name: Hotel Estera
description: Conveniently situated in Kraków, Hotel Estera provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.4 km from St. Mary's Basilica. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room comes with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Hotel Estera offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lost Souls Alley, Wawel Royal Castle and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Hotel Estera, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Krakow
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 300 guestrooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at AC Hotel by Marriott Krakow, you'll be centrally located in Kraków, within a 10-minute drive of Main Market Square and Blonia Park. This 4-star hotel is 9.7 mi (15.7 km) from Wieliczka Salt Mine and 2 mi (3.3 km) from Royal Road. Dining Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at Sobremesa Restaurant, a fine-dining restaurant which features a bar/lounge and a garden view. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. name: Hampton by Hilton Krakow Airport
address: Kapitana M. Medweckiego str. 22, 32-083 Balice, Malopolskie
description: Next to John Paul II Krakow-Balice International Airport, we are 30 minutes from Krakow city center. Visit attractions and historical sites like Wawel Royal Castle and Oskar Schindler's Factory Museum, both within 20 kilometers of our hotel. WiFi and breakfast are included, as well as access to our fitness center.Hilton

name: Art Suites Luxury Hotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.5 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Art Suites Luxury Hotel features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is set 2 km from National Museum of Krakow. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Art Suites Luxury Hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Town Hall Tower is 2.5 km from Art Suites Luxury Hotel, while Main Market Square is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Polonia
description: The historic Hotel Polonia is situated in the Old Town Kraków, just 650 metres from Main Market Square. City’s main railway station, Kraków, Główny, is only a 5-minute walk away. All rooms at the Polonia are classically furnished and come with traditional décor. Each has a spacious bathroom with a shower. Some offer air conditioning. Guests receive a complimentary bottle of water. A traditional breakfast buffet is served daily. The Polonia Restaurant offers Polish dishes and homemade specialities. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange trips to Wieliczka Salt Mine, as well as luggage storage. Shuttle services can be arranged. Hotel Polonia overlooks the Słowacki Theatre and the Kraków Barbican. Wawel Royal Castle is just a 20-minute walk away. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Mall is just round the corner.

name: Hotel Saski Krakow, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: With 200 years of history, our hotel is one block from Old Town’s main plaza and The Cloth Hall. Nearly all Old Town’s restaurants, museums, galleries, and shops are within a 10-minute walk, and Wawel Royal Castle is a 15-minute walk. Take a tram to the Jewish district of Kazimierz. At the end of the day, enjoy a bite and drinks at our on-site restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Wawel
description: Hotel Wawel is located in Kraków’s Old Town, between Wawel Castle and the Main Market Square. It features modernly appointed rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Wawel occupies a 16th-century building that has been redesigned in Art Nouveau style. The air-conditioned rooms are fitted with an elegant bathroom and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The Wawel’s friendly staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service. The restaurant serves traditional European dishes, and a wide selection of drinks can be enjoyed in the bar or the hotel's summer garden. In the morning, a varied buffet breakfast is served. Hotel Wawel is located within just a 10-minute walk from the Kazimierz Jewish District. Many lovely cafés, restaurants and clubs can be found just outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Santi
description: Located in the historic house in the Old Town of Kraków, a very short walk from the Main Market Square, 4-star Hotel Santi offers classically furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi and picturesque Old Town Views. Every room in Hotel Santi features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a tea and coffee making set and a bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms on the 1st and 2nd floor feature unique frescoes from the 18th and 19th century. The hotel offers airport transfer and ticket services. Buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant and there is a bar next to the reception. It is 1 km to Kraków Główny Train Station. It takes 7 minutes to walk to Wawel Castle and 15 minutes – to Kazimierz District.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Krakow
description: Radisson Blu is a 5-star hotel, located just a 7-minute walk of Kraków’s Main Market Square and the Royal Wawel Castle. It offers spacious and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free access to sauna and a fitness club is provided. All non-smoking rooms at the Radisson Blu are classically furnished and bright. Each comes with tea and coffee-making facilities and a luxurious bathroom with a bathtub. Some have a seating area. A varied breakfast is served every morning at the Solfez restaurant. Guests can enjoy international and seafood dishes at the Milk&Co restaurant or a wide selection of coffee at Salt&Co bar. For guests travelling with small children the hotel offers bath toys and cosmetics, as well as bathrobes and slippers. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange concierge service. A beauty salon and massage treatments are available. Guests can rent out bicycles for free. Radisson Blu Hotel Kraków is located only 1.5 km from Kraków Główny Railway Station. City’s main attractions are located within just a few-minute walk.

name: Aparthotel Best Views
description: Aparthotel Best Views offers accommodation in Kraków, near the Vistula Boulevards. Wawel Royal Castle is a 1-minute walk away, as well as the Main Market Square. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. All air-conditioned units include a satellite flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area with an iPod docking station and CD player. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher. An oven, a microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries in every unit. Bed linen is available. There is also a 24-hour shop in the same building, as well as jewellery shop and currency exchange. Bike hire and car hire are available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Jagiellonian University is 500 metres from Aparthotel Best Views, while National Museum of Krakow is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 9 km from Aparthotel Best Views.

name: Hotel Unicus Palace
description: Boasting a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel Unicus Palace is situated in the centre of Kraków, 1.4 km from National Museum of Krakow. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a hammam. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Unicus Palace rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Unicus Palace include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Benefis Boutique Hotel
description: Conveniently located 500 metres from Wawel Royal Castle and 1 km from Krakow’s Main Market Square and Old Town, Hotel Benefis offers free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. Feel at home in large, soundproof rooms with new, fully-equipped bathrooms and private balconies. All rooms also include breakfast and satellite channels. A safety deposit box is available at the reception. A varied breakfast buffet to satisfy all tastes is served in the hotel’s restaurant. Monitored car park area is available but limited so guests are advised to secure a reservation when booking. The friendly staff creates an inviting atmosphere for all guests and can offer tips on what to do and see during your stay or arrange tickets and tours.

name: Hotel Wit Stwosz
description: Located in the heart of old Krakow, Hotel Wit Stwosz is just a 2-minute walk from the Main Market Square. It offers elegant rooms with free wired and Wi-Fi internet and satellite TV. All rooms at the Wit Stwosz are air-conditioned, classically furnished and complete with a refrigerator, and a safe. Each has a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A free bottle of mineral water is offered in every room, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. The hotel comes with 14th-century interiors, high ceilings and large windows. The hotel's breakfast restaurant is also decorated to reflect the buildings history and specialises in traditional Polish cuisine. The property offers gluten free, vegan and vegetarian breakfast options. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange tours and airport shuttle service. Hotel Wit Stwosz is located within a short walk to main city’s attractions, like the Cloth Hall or Wawel Royal Castle.

name: H11 Aparthotel
description: H11 Aparthotel has well-equipped accommodation boasting free WiFi in the centre of Kraków, less than 1 km from National Museum of Krakow and a 10-minute walk from Town Hall Tower. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. If you would like to discover the area, walking tours is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Main Market Square, Cloth Hall and Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from H11 Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Wielopole
description: The 3-star boutique Hotel Wielopole is located 5 minutes’ walk from Kraków’s Main Market Square. Its rooms offer a fridge, tea/coffee facilities and free WiFi. In the morning a varied breakfast is served. The air-conditioned rooms at the Wielopole are spacious, classically furnished and include high-quality mattresses. Each comes with satellite TV and a work desk. All have a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Hotel Wielopole houses a restaurant which serves Polish and international dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The helpful front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange airport transfer or car rental, as well as provide tourist information and city guides. Guests of Hotel Wielopole can walk to Wawel Castle and Kazimierz Jewish District in just 10 minutes. Excellent bus and tram connections allow for easy access to all parts of the city.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Krakow. Guests can also take advantage of free wireless internet throughout their stay. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town, including 24-hour room service, meeting rooms and an express check-in and check-out feature. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town features 100 air conditioned rooms. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and plenty of workspace. The on-site restaurant offers European dishes in a traditional setting. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. Krakow's attractions, such as Wawel Cathedral, the Wawel Royal Castle and Main Market Square, are within easy walking distance of Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow Old Town. The hotel also provides parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Mr67 Mayera Rapaporta
description: Situated in Kraków, within 600 metres of Wawel Royal Castle and less than 1 km of St. Mary's Basilica, MR67 Mayera Rapaporta provides accommodation with free wifi. The property is set a 12-minute walk from Town Hall Tower. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Rooms have air conditioning, and some units at MR67 Mayera Rapaporta have a balcony. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. Main Market Square is 1 km from MR67 Mayera Rapaporta. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: ibis Styles Kraków Centrum
description: Center of Krakow is dream location for tourists and for business trip. ibis Styles Krakow Centrum is a friendly place, well-equipped with all comforts and close to main attractions. ibis Styles Krakow Centrum combines history with modernity. Original, sophisticated design creates a cozy, energizing atmosphere, ideal to and work. Rooms are decorated with maximum attention to detail and functionalityaccorhotels.com

name: Happy Tower
description: Happy Tower is an accommodation located in Kraków, within a 15-minute walk from the Main Market Square, Wawel Royal Castle and Kazimierz Jewish District. The modern apartments will provide you with a TV. There is a fully equipped kitchenette in some of the apartments. Private bathrooms come with a shower. You can enjoy city view from the rooms. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out St. Mary's Basilica (850 metres). Krakow - Balice Airport is located 12 km from the property.

name: Barbakan Residence Old Town
description: Barbakan Residence Old Town is located in the centre of Kraków, close to St. Florian's Gate, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Krakow Central Railway Station, Galeria Krakowska and Wawel Royal Castle. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Barbakan Residence Old Town, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Privilege Suites Loft Affair Collection
description: No description found

name: Vienna House Andel's Cracow
description: Vienna House Andel's Cracow is a contemporary 4-star hotel, located just 9 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square in Kraków. Its designer rooms come with air conditioning and satellite TV. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Mavericks Restaurant, which serves creative, California-style dishes with Asian, Mexican and European influences. In the evening, guests can relax over a drink in the bar Smok. The spacious rooms at Vienna House Andel's Cracow come with a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe box. Some are located on the top floors and feature panoramic views of the beautiful Old Town. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange airport shuttle service and tips on what to do and see in Kraków. Guests can relax in the sauna or work out in the fitness centre. Vienna House Andel's Cracow is situated in the very heart of the city, just off the Main Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska, Kraków’s main shopping centre.

name: Hotel Pod Roza
description: The recently renovated 5-star Hotel Pod Różą is housed in a Renaissance palace in Kraków's Old Town, just off the Main Market Square. It features elegant restaurant and stylish, air-conditioned rooms. Pod Różą is the oldest hotel in Kraków and hosted many famous guests since the 17th century. The rooms at Pod Różą are traditionally decorated and come with a luxurious bathroom with heated floors and Italian fittings. All have free internet and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Wellness & Spa access is included in the room price. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Pod Różą, which specialises in traditional Polish dishes. Hotel Pod Różą is located within a 10-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle. Kazimierz, the famous Jewish district, is just one kilometer away.

name: Hotel 32 Kraków Old Town
description: Located 500 metres from Wawel Royal Castle and 700 metres from the Market Square in Kraków, Hotel 32 Kraków Old Town offers a sauna and free WiFi. The rooms are equipped with a seating area, air-conditioning, a minibar, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Some units feature a terrace. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help guests with any queries that they may have. National Museum of Krakow is a 7-minute walk from Hotel 32 Kraków Old Town. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Red Brick Apartments
description: Red Brick Apartments are situated just 750 metres from Kraków’s Main Market Square. All are spacious and feature free Wi-Fi. The property also provides an exlusive offer of a private and secured parking lot nearby reserved only for guests. Some of the apartments are equipped with a kitchen area that comes with a dishwasher, refrigerator and microwave. There is also an LCD TV with satellite channels. The staff can arrange for transfers and tours around the city, as well as to Wieliczka and Auschwitz. The apartments at Red Brick are located steps from the Galeria Krakowska shopping centre. Kraków Główny Railway Station is just a 5-minute walk away.

name: Dom Casimi
description: Situated in the heart of Kazimierz, the former Jewish quarter, within walking distance of Krakow’s Main Square and Wawel Castle, Dom Casimi offers easy access to the city’s attractions. The non-smoking rooms at Casimi are classically decorated in warm colours. Each comes with a TV and a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Free Wi-Fi is available. Guests can enjoy their meals at the restaurant located in the same building. There are numerous bars and cafés in the area. Dom Casimi offers tour desk services and an airport shuttle, as well as bicycles for rent. Kraków Główny Train Station is about 1.6 km away.

name: Wyndham Grand Krakow Old Town
description: No description found

name: Hotel Europejski
description: Europejski Hotel is located in the very heart of Kraków, just 10 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square and 5 minutes' walk from Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre and Kraków Główny Railway Station. It offers classically appointed rooms with free Wi-Fi. The beautifully furnished rooms at the Europejski come with satellite TV and a telephone. All feature a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Hotel Europejski is distinguished by having its own car park in the city center as well as organizing various events upon request and additional surcharge. The professional staff of the Europejski is available 24 hours a day and will provide guests with any tourist information needed. Kazimierz Jewish District can be reached by tram in just 5 minutes. Wawel Royal Castle is a 15 minute walk away.

name: Aparthotel Globus Kraków
description: Located in the historic part of Kraków, Globus offers rooms with private bathrooms with a shower or a bathtub and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available in the rooms. Globus is situated in Kazimierz, Krakow’s old Jewish quarter, only 650 metres from the Old Synagogue. The Old Town’s Main Market and Wawel castle are each about 800 metres away. The Globus’s heated rooms feature wooden furniture in warm colours. Each one is equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels, and a work desk. They also feature hypoallergenic linens and a free bottle of mineral water. Some are air-conditioned. Buffet breakfasts are served in the restaurant of the nearby Kazimir Restaurant on 11, Miodowa street. On request, it is possible to order breakfast in the room in the form of a Breakfast Box. The staff is at your service 24/7 and will provide you with ticket services, tourist information and help you organise your stay in Kraków. A 24-hour reception is available for the Globus Aparthotel guests in the Aparthotel Leone, 150 m away.

name: Hotel Artur
description: Hotel Artur is situated just off the A4 motorway and the Kraków ring road. It offers good bus and tram connections with the Kazimierz Jewish District (4 km) and Wawel Castle (6 km). Parking is available at a surcharge of 20 PLN per day. Located in Kraków, 6 km from the city centre and 3 km from the Wieliczka Salt Mine, Hotel Artur offers spacious rooms with an electric kettle and free internet. A bus trip to central Kraków takes 25 minutes and a bus stop is right outside the hotel. The rooms at the Artur are bright, quiet and well equipped with satellite TV and a work desk. All have a bathroom with a hairdryer. In the morning, guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast. The Artur Restaurant serves Polish and European dishes and is open until 22:00. The staff of Hotel Artur are available 24 hours a day and offer professional help with organising tours over the area. The hotel is a 20-minute drive away from Kraków Balice Airport.

name: Vinfort Aparthotel
description: Set within 200 metres of Lost Souls Alley and 200 metres of St. Mary's Basilica in the centre of Kraków, Vinfort Aparthotel offers accommodation with free WiFi. The units come with carpeted floor and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include St. Florian's Gate, Krakow Central Railway Station and Wawel Royal Castle. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 17 km from Vinfort Aparthotel.

name: Hotel M29
description: Conveniently set in Kraków, Hotel M29 provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. At Hotel M29 you will find a restaurant serving Italian, local and European cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Kraków, like hiking. Popular points of interest near Hotel M29 include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Wawel Royal Castle. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Merci Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Kraków, 4.5 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Merci Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms include a private bathroom and bed linen. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Merci Boutique Hotel offers a sun terrace. Schindler Factory Museum is 4.8 km from the accommodation, while National Museum of Krakow is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 21 km from Merci Boutique Hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Krakow City Centre
description: Central Krakow hotel in the heart of the Old Town, with free Wi-Fi and a conference centre.The Holiday Inn® Krakow City Centre hotel is a five-minute walk from the vast Main Square in the city’s historic Old Town. Local tram and bus stops are nearby, and Kraków Główny train station is within easy reach. John Paul II International Airport Kraków–Balice is a 25-minute drive.The hotel’s 12 fully equipped function spaces include a stylish conference room for up to 440 people, and a short drive takes you to the ICE Krakow Congress Centre.Krakow's 13th-century Rynek Główny square is lined with palaces and churches, including the iconic St. Mary’s Basilica. The Kazimierz Jewish Quarter, a 12-minute walk, is home to the 15th-century Old Synagogue and its Jewish culture museum. You can walk to the hilltop Wawel Royal Castle and the art museum within 15 minutes.At this hotel, you can enjoy IHG One Rewards free WI-FI throughout the building, a business centre, on-site parking for a daily fee, and a mini-gym. Rooms come with a pillow menu to help you get a good night’s sleep. Wake up to a continental buffet breakfast in The City restaurant, and dine on Polish and Mediterranean cuisine in the stylish Impresja. After a busy day, enjoy an energising mini-gym workout or relax with friends in the lively Reflections Bar and Restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Stradonia Serviced Apartments
description: STRADONIA Serviced Apartments is located in the heart of Krakow, just 200 metres from one of the city’s greatest treasures, Wawel Royal Castle. The property is located in a renovated 16th century building with a lounge, lifts and a 24-hour reception. The apartment will provide you with free WiFi, air conditioning and a balcony or a terrace There is a full a kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view and garden view from the room. Paid private parking is available, as is paid public parking in front of the building. Bike rental is available on site. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Kazimierz Jewish District (250 metres) and Cloth Hall (850 metres). Krakow - Balice Airport is located 15 km away and the property offers shuttle service for an additional fee.

name: H15 Hotel Francuski
description: The elegant, 5-star H15 Hotel Francuski is located only 400 metres from the Main Market Square in Kraków. It offers stylish rooms with free internet, tea and coffee-making facilities and a minibar. All rooms at the Francuski are decorated in Art Nouveau style with period details and furniture. Each comes with satellite TV and a bathroom with a bathtub or shower, toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service, store guests’ valuables in the safe or assist with luggage storage. Concierge services can also be arranged for. H15 Hotel Francuski is situated 1.2 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. The city’s main railway station, Kraków Główny, is only a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Krakow Airport
description: A convenient base for guests who want to catch a flight, or those who wish to spend some time exploring the city, the Hilton Garden Inn Krakow Airport hotel is located just opposite Krakow Airport, and offers easy access to many shops, restaurants, entertainment and attractions. Follow the ‘Royal Route’ through the historic Old Town, or admire the magnificent Romanesque, Renaissance and Gothic architecture of Wawel Castle. Catch a bus from the city center to the impressive Wieliczka Salt Mines, or escape from the hustle and bustle of the city to Lake Kryspinow: a huge lake which boasts an artificial beach, a guarded swimming area and recreation facilities. With nine flexible meeting rooms, a boardroom, the latest A/V technology and a 24-hour business center, this Krakow Airport hotel is ideal for a variety of business and social events for up to 352 people. Print documents securely from your guest room to the complimentary 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Settle into an comfortable and contemporary guest room or suite at this hotel near Krakow Airport, equipped with a work desk and ergonomic task chair, a 39-inch flat-screen TV and a plush Suite Dreams by Serta Bed. Work out in the complimentary fitness center and stock up on snacks, drinks and sundries in the Pavilion Pantry. Unwind with a glass of wine or beer before dining in the Garden Grille & Bar, which offers delicious international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.Hilton

name: Hotel Senacki
description: Overlooking the 17th century Church of St Peter and Paul, Hotel Senacki is located in Kraków’s Royal Route. It offers classic rooms with satellite TV and free internet access. The elegant rooms of the Senacki feature a traditional and functional design. All come with a minibar, radio and a telephone. They also have tea and coffee making facilities. Each bathroom has a hairdryer. Hotel Senacki is situated just 450 metres from Kraków’s Wawel Castle. Kazimierz, the old Jewish District is within 700 metres, while the Main Market Square is just 350 metres away. In the mornings, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s 14th century cellars.

name: Hotel Perla
description: Hotel Perła is located in a quiet area of Cracow and offers elegant accommodation with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk service. Each room at Perła features a modern bathroom, as well as a seating area. There also are desks to work at, equipped with telephones. Guests are welcome to dine in the restaurant, offering European dishes and traditional Polish cuisine. A large selection of drinks is available in the bar. Hotel Perła is located 7.8 km from the Market Square, with easy access to Balice Airport and to the Zakopane-Kraków motorway. The Shrine of Divine Mercy in Łagiewniki is 3 km away. The hotel has a direct rail connection to Energylandia. Travel time from Kraków Swoszowice station to Zator-Park Rozrywki station is 50 minutes.

name: W Sercu Krakowa Aparthotel
description: Featuring a garden, W Sercu Krakowa Aparthotel is located in the centre of Kraków, close to National Museum of Krakow, Town Hall Tower and Main Market Square. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near W Sercu Krakowa Aparthotel include Cloth Hall, Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Unikat Guest Rooms
description: No description found

name: Hotel Columbus
description: The Columbus Hotel is located in Kraków’s Kazimierz District, just 300 metres away from the Tempel (Temple) Synagogue. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free internet access. The rooms have a modern design, and the furniture is done in exotic wood. Each includes a satellite TV, safety deposit box, minibar and work desk. There is also a bathroom with a hairdryer and a telephone. Free mineral water is provided. Some have balconies. A breakfast buffet is available in the morning. The staff of the Columbus is at your disposal 24/7 and will happily arrange tickets and car/bicycle rental for you. A massage can be enjoyed at a surcharge. The area offers many restaurants and bars. The Planty Park is 750 metres from the hotel. The Kraków Old Town, which features such landmarks as the barbican and The Wawel Royal Castle, is 850 metres away.

name: Best Western Plus Krakow Old Town
description: Our new renovated hotel is already open! Completely renovated unique interiors of the Hotel impresses with its bold colors, custom furnishings and unique, and modern design. Best Western Plus Kraków Old Town Hotel is situated at the very center of the city, making it the ideal choice for anyone on a business trip who wishes to absorb the magic of Europe’s most glorious city at one and the same time. It is also the perfect haven for tourists who want to have the major attractions of the Old Town and the ancient Jewish quarter of Kazimierz no more than a few steps away. At the Best Western Plus Krakow Old Town Hotel, we guarantee superb working conditions, a place tailor-made for relaxing and providing an agreeable atmosphere in which to hold business meetings. Hotel has 92 air conditioned rooms. All rooms are furnished with air conditioning, an LCD TV, telephone, radio, hair dryer, free Wi-Fi internet, iron and ironing board, mini fridge and coffee/tea facilities. Our conference facilities make the hotel an ideal place for holding professional training courses and conferences or small-scale business meetings. The hotel’s elegant restaurant offers exquisite Polish and European cuisine and our Drink Bar serves an extensive range of drinks, cocktails and desserts. The spacious restaurant provides the perfect place for banquets, parties, wedding receptions and gatherings on every kind of occasion. Child policy: For every two paying adults, one child 4 and under is free in the existing bedding.bestwestern.com

name: Grand Ascot Hotel
description: Located in central Kraków, the 4-star Grand Ascot Hotel is just 600 metres from the Main Market Square and within short walking distance from multiple landmarks and other attractions of the Kraków Old Town. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar. All rooms at the Grand Ascot Hotel are air-conditioned and equipped with tea/coffee making facilities, ironing facilities, a TV and a fridge. Extras include a work desk, free WiFi and a safe. There is a 24-hour front desk, as well as conference facilities at the property. A sauna and a gym are also available. The famous Kazimierz Jewish District is 2 km from Grand Ascot Hotel, while the Central Railway Station is 1.5 km away. Krakow - Balice Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: Mercure Krakow Stare Miasto
description: We are located between Krakowskie Centrum Komunikacji, Krakow Communication Center and the old town, which is only a 10-minute walk from our hotel. Our building boasts a unique facade and interiors. Stylish rooms and a modern conference center are our response to the needs of a rapidly changing Krakow. The Winestone Restaurant is a unique place where you can savor delicious meals, meet with friends or simply relax after a busy day. We are truly passionate about our guests.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Elektor
description: Situated in the heart of the Old Town, just a 3-minute walk from Kraków’s Main Market Square, the 3-star Hotel Elektor Premium offers spacious, well-equipped rooms with a flat-screen TV and a tea/coffee maker. WiFi is free in the entire property. The rooms at the Elektor are air-conditioned and have private bathrooms with a bath and with a shower head, a hairdryer and free toiletries. All are equipped with a minibar, an ironing board and a work desk. Some rooms offer a view of the famous Słowackiego Theatre. Guests can find the on-site Italian restaurant Luna Siciliana Ristorante which serves pasta, pizza and other dishes. In the morning, guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast. The helpful staff of the Elektor can arrange for free luggage storage and help organising sightseeing tours, for example to the Wieliczka Salt Mine, Częstochowa, Zakopane or Oświęcim. Airport shuttle is available at a surcharge. Hotel Elektor Premium is housed in a historic tenement house, located just 500 metres from Kraków Główny Railway Station. Wawel Castle is 1 km away, while Kazimierz is 900 metres from the hotel.

name: Krakow For You Main Square Apartments
description: Krakow For You Main Square Apartments are located in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town, only 50 metres from the Main Square. It offers self-catering apartments with flat-screen TV with Polish channels and free WiFi. The apartments of Krakow For You Main Square Apartments are spacious and feature a modern interior design. All have a kitchenette with an electric kettle and a refrigerator. The front desk of Krakow For You Main Square Apartments can arrange tickets and provides tour information. A shuttle service is available. There are many landmarks nearby, including the Cloth Hall and St Mary’s Basilica, both of which are within 140 metres. The Wawel Castle is within 600 metres.

name: Hotel Maltanski
description: The 3-star Hotel Maltański is located 500 metres from the Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square. It offers elegant rooms with free internet, heated bathroom floor and tea and coffee-making facilities. A varied buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in international dishes. All rooms at the Maltański are classically furnished and decorated with stylish features. Each comes with a minibar and cable TV. Most rooms have a patio, where guests can relax after a long day. Free bottle of mineral water and newspapers are offered. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can store guests’ valuables in the hotel safe. Dry cleaning and laundry services can be arranged. Hotel Maltański is situated only 300 metres from Wawel Royal Castle. The peaceful Planty Park is just outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Polski Pod Bialym Orlem
description: The 5-star Hotel Polski is located just opposite the St. Florian’s Gate, 4 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square. It offers spacious rooms and luxury suites with free WiFi. All rooms at the Polski Pod Białym Orłem are elegant and decorated with warm colours. Each comes with tea and coffee making facilities, a satellite TV and a minibar. Each room is equipped with a safe, where guests can store their valuables. Hotel restaurant, Pijarska 17 offers Polish dishes. Friendly hotel staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange city tours or concierge services. Hotel Polski Pod Białym Orłem is located within just a 15-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle. The bus and railway stations are only 300 metres away.

name: Ventus Rosa Boutique Aparthotel
description: Ventus Rosa Boutique Aparthotel is situated in the Old Town of Kraków, close to Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and St. Florian's Gate. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower and a hairdryer. A stovetop and toaster are also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a buffet or Full English/Irish breakfast. Wawel Royal Castle is 1 km from Ventus Rosa Boutique Aparthotel, while Cloth Hall is 650 m from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Due to our exceptional location in the heart of Krakow, the facility has a limited number of parking spaces in front of the hotel (prior reservation is required) and a quarded parking lot 300 meters from the facility.

name: Hotel Rubinstein
description: Hotel Rubinstein is housed in a 15th-century building, located in the heart of the Kazimierz District in Kraków, just off the Old Synagogue. Its rooms and apartments offer air conditioning. All rooms and apartments at the Hotel Rubinstein come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a safe. Many feature impressive wooden ceilings and beams from the 17th and 18th century. A varied buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. It is served at the Rubinstein Restaurant, situated on a glazed patio and specialised in international dishes. After a long day, guest can relax in the Rubinstein’s sauna. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and offers tourist information on what to see and do in Kraków. Rubinstein Hotel is located within just a 10-minute walk of the beautiful Wawel Royal Castle.

name: Yourplace Biskupia Aparthotel
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and an LCD TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hotel Ester
description: The Hotel Ester is located in the heart of Kazimierz, Kraków’s historic Jewish district, within 20 metres of the Old Synagogue. All rooms have private bathrooms and a free Wi-Fi connection. Ester’s air-conditioned rooms all feature flat-screen satellite TVs. Each has a work desk and a refrigerator. A safety deposit box and free mineral water are also provided. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is offered on-site. Later in the day, Ester’s restaurant serves traditional Polish and Jewish dishes. After a meal guests can get a massage or visit the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s staff is available 24 hours a day. The hotel's tour desk will help guests organise trips to the many places of interest that surround Kraków, such as the Wieliczka Salt Mine. The Wawel Castle and Old Town’s Main Market are within the is 1.3 km from the hotel.

name: Krowodrza Centrum Konferencyjno - Hotelowe
description: Set in Kraków, 2.7 km from Krakow Central Railway Station, Krowodrza Centrum Konferencyjno - Hotelowe offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Krowodrza Centrum Konferencyjno - Hotelowe all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Galeria Krakowska is 3 km from Krowodrza Centrum Konferencyjno - Hotelowe, while St. Florian's Gate is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Grottger Luxury Boutique Hotel City
description: Located in a renovated Art Deco villa in the quiet, exclusive neighbourhood in central Kraków, 1,2 km from the Old Town and 1,5 km from the historic Main Market Square, Grottger Luxury Boutique Hotel City features a garden and terrace. Free private parking is available on site. Each room here is individually designed, with oakwood floors, a private, marble bathroom with free toiletries and a flat-screen TV in every unit. Blackout curtains and safes are available. All rooms come with tea/coffee making facilities and mineral water, as well as air conditioning. Towels are offered. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. The property also offers delivery of selected food products. Car hire is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Cloth Hall is 1.5 km from Grottger Luxury Boutique Hotel City, while National Museum of Krakow is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II Airport, 9 km from Hotel Grottger.

name: Hotel Perfect
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Kraków, Hotel Perfect offers 4-star accommodation close to Wawel Royal Castle and St. Mary's Basilica. The property is close to Main Market Square, Cloth Hall and St. Florian's Gate. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Perfect each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Perfect include Lost Souls Alley, Schindler Factory Museum and Town Hall Tower. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Angel House Aparthotel
description: Angel House Aparthotel is located in the centre of Kraków, 550 metres from the Wawel Royal Castle. The property is a 10 minutes’ walk from both the Kazimierz Jewish District and the Main Railway Station in Kraków. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room at Angel House Aparthotel comes with a private bathroom. In the morning, guests of Angel House can enjoy breakfast, prepared from healthy, local products. The property provides access to a kitchen equipped with a microwave, refrigerator, toaster, kettle, coffee maker, dishwasher, dishes, cutlery. At a surcharge, the property organises tours of Kraków and the surrounding area. The Main Market Square is 1 km away. Free self check-in is possible after 8PM. All requests for late arrival are subject to confirmation by the property.

name: Maly Krakow Aparthotel
description: Mały Kraków Aparthotel is conveniently located only 300 metres from Kraków Główny Railway Station. It features comfortable rooms with free internet, a fully equipped kitchenette and satellite TV. Aparthotel provides an exlusive offer of a private and secured parking lot nearby reserved only for guests. All rooms at the Mały Kraków are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms offer a kitchenette with a refrigerator. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day on the opposite side of the street (Kurniki 3) and can arrange shuttle service or sightseeing trips. Mały Kraków Aparthotel is situated 400 metres from the Planty Park. The beautiful Main Market Square with many restaurants and cafés is just 750 metres away.

name: Hotel Rezydent
description: Hotel Rezydent boasts a fantastic location in the heart of Cracow’s Old Town, just a short walk away from the beautiful Main Market Square. It retained a lot of original features, such as Medieval frescoes and wooden ceilings. The rooms offered by Rezydent are elegantly decorated in warm colours. Many of them have great views of Grodzka Street. All come with a bathroom and are equipped with satellite TV, a radio and a telephone. Rooms are located in three buildings - one of them has a lift. Free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel's public areas and an airport shuttle is offered at a surcharge. Kraków Główny Train Station is 1 km away and the royal Wawel Castle is just 700 metres away from Hotel Rezydent.

name: Garbarska 22 Aparthotel
description: Situated in the centre of Kraków, within 1.1 km of National Museum of Krakow and 700 metres of Town Hall Tower, Garbarska 22 Aparthotel features accommodation with free WiFi. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Main Market Square, Cloth Hall and Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from Garbarska 22 Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aparthotel Pergamin
description: Located just 800 metres from Kraków Główny Railway Station, Aparthotel Pergamin's air-conditioned rooms offer a flat-screen TV, DVD player and a minibar. Wi-Fi is free in the entire property. The rooms at the Pergamin feature a unique design done in brown and beige tones and wooden furnishings. All include an electric kettle, safety deposit box and work desk. Breakfast is available daily. Served directly to the room on set time. The Aparthotel is situated 300 metres from Planty Park, surrounding Kraków’s Old Town. The Main Market Square is within 700 metres. The Wawel Castle is 1.6 km from the Pergamin. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre is 600 metres away. The front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and will gladly provide guests tourist information and help them organise a tour. It also provides an airport shuttle.

name: Aparthotel Camea
description: Aparthotel Camea is located in the centre of old Kraków, just a one-minute walk of the Main Market Square. It features air-conditioned rooms with free high-speed internet and LCD TV. All rooms at the Camea are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are furnished with antique furniture. Some have a balcony. Massage services are available upon request. Front desk staff can assist with sightseeing tours and bicycle/car rental services. Aparthotel Camea is located within a 2-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. Kazimierz, the Jewish District is just 600 metres away. Kraków Główny Railway Station is 800 metres from the Camea.

name: Hampton by Hilton Krakow
description: Get your day off to the best start - there is a hot breakfast included when you stay. Stock up on all your favorite snacks and beverages in the convenience store, or unwind with a drink and a tasty bite at any time in the bar. Maintaining your exercise routine is easy in the contemporary fitness center. Keep in touch with the office in the free work zone, and plan a conference, training session or social event with four flexible meeting spaces and state-of-the-art A/V equipment. Our friendly, professional staff will be on hand to make sure that your meeting or celebration is seamless and hassle-free. All of the comfortable and stylish guest rooms at the Hampton by Hilton Krakow hotel boast modern decor and are equipped with free WiFi, a 32-inch LCD TV, a work desk, coffee/tea making facilities, a radio alarm clock, and an iron and ironing board. The spacious bathroom has a walk-in shower, and the comfy bed has a premium mattress and ample soft pillows, ensuring a restful night’s sleep. Larger corner rooms and accessible guest rooms are also available for your comfort and convenience. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you’re not satisfied, we don’t expect you to pay. That’s our commitment and your guarantee. That’s 100% Hampton by Hilton™.Hilton

name: Q Hotel Kraków
description: Q Hotel Kraków is located in Kraków and offers free WiFi access. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning. There is also an electric kettle. Private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. Extras include a desk and bed linen. At Q Hotel Kraków you will find a 24-hour front desk and a restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage. The hotel is 2.8 km from Wisla Krakow Stadium, 3.1 km from Military Hospital with Policlinic and 3.2 km from John Paul II Hospital - Krakow. Krakow - Balice Airport is 7 km away.

name: Plaza Boutique Hotel
description: 2.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum, Plaza Boutique Hotel is situated in Kraków and has a bar and free WiFi. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. It is located 2.1 km from Galeria Kazimierz and 2.7 km from Wawel Royal Castle. All rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guest rooms at Plaza Boutique Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. St. Mary's Basilica is 3.2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 23 km from Plaza Boutique Hotel.

name: Hotel Maximum
description: Boasting a restaurant, Hotel Maximum is situated in the centre of Kraków, 500 metres from Lost Souls Alley. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Galeria Krakowska, Wawel Royal Castle, and National Museum of Krakow. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Maximum rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Mary's Basilica, St. Florian's Gate and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 17 km from Hotel Maximum.

name: Automobil Hotel
description: 3-star Automobil Hotel is located 7.6 km from the Main Market Square in the Old Town. This modern hotel features automobile history theme. Free WiFi access is available, as is private parking. Each modern room here will provide you with a work area, 32-inch LCD TV and an electric kettle with a welcome set. Featuring a spacious shower cabin, every bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Apartments are air-conditioned. At Automobil Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk, luggage storage and a vending machine. Ironing equipment, children's cots and automobile magazines are available at the reception. Guests travelling with motor bikes can park them in the monitored and locked roofed area, at a surcharge. The hotel is 7.6 km from Krakow Trade Fairs and 6.3 km from Schindler Factory Museum. Kraków Główny Railway Station is within 9 km and Kraków Airport is 32 km away.

name: Booking Hotel Crown Piast & Spa
description: The 5-star Crown Piast Hotel & Park is located within a 10-minute drive of Kraków’s city centre and is surrounded by a large, green garden. It offers classically decorated rooms, as well as tennis courts and monitored parking. All rooms at the Crown Piast are spacious, air-conditioned and decorated with classic furniture. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, tea and coffee making facilities and a LED TV with satellite channels. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with bicycle rental or provide tourist information. A breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Anturium. Guests can also try a selection of lunches and desserts at the Coffee Bar, on a terrace or in the Karczma Regionalna located deep in the garden. Crown Piast Hotel & Park is located within a 15-minute drive of the Kraków Balice Airport. Airport shuttle is available at a surcharge.

name: Hotel Kazimierz II
description: Hotel Kazimierz II is superbly located in the centre of the Kazimierz Jewish Old Town District of Kraków, offering easy access to the Main Market Square and Wawel Royal Castle, as well as free WiFi. The rooms at Hotel Kazimierz II are bright and classically decorated. Each comes with a bathroom fitted with a shower, as well as a TV and a radio. Breakfast buffet is available every morning. Hotel Kazimierz II offers ironing and laundry services, as well as airport shuttle and the staff will be happy to help guests with organising their sightseeing trips. Old Synagogue is 170 metres away and Kraków Główny Train Station is 1.8 km away from Hotel Kazimierz II.

name: Aparthotel Inspire Miodova Residence
description: Providing city views and free WiFi, Aparthotel Inspire Miodova Residence provides accommodation well located in the Old Town of Kraków, within a short distance of Main Market Square, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a kettle. The aparthotel offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near Aparthotel Inspire Miodova include Wawel Royal Castle, Schindler Factory Museum and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Venetian House Market Square Aparthotel
description: No description found

name: Amber Boutique Hotels - Hotel Amber
description: Amber Boutique Hotels - Hotel Amber is situated in Kraków’s Old Town, a 6-minute walk from the Main Market Square. It offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and with free high-speed Wi-Fi. The Wawel Castle and the Planty Park are within a walking distance. The Amber is housed in a 19th-century tenement house, on a quiet street. Its modern and air-conditioned rooms come with tea/coffee makers, satellite TV and work desks. Each has a safe and a refrigerator. Guests have at their disposal a mini-fitness room, which is free of charge, and a sauna for an extra charge. There is a 24-hour reception desk, as well as a Club Room with a library, available after 16:00, and a conference room. Buffet breakfast is served every day from 7 a.m. till 10 a.m. in the hotel's restaurant. Vegan, gluten-free or lactose-free options are available on request. Amber Boutique Hotels - Hotel Amber is located 1 km from the Kraków Główny Train Station and the Galeria Krakowska Shopping Mall.

name: Armon Residence
description: No description found

name: Vanilla Aparthotel
description: Aparthotel Vanilla offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and wired internet. Each one features elegant interiors and a LED TV. The apartments at Vanilla come with spacious bathrooms. All apartments come with air-conditioning. There is a kitchenette with a stove, a refrigerator, a microwave and a dining area. The ground floor of the property includes a small shopping centre Pasaż 33 with food, grocery shop and cosmetic shop. Vanilla can arrange airport shuttle services, as well as provide you with tickets to tourist attractions. Guests can enjoy Oregano restaurant which offers specialises of Italian and Polish cuisine. There is a tram stop located right across the Aparthotel Vanilla, and it allows for quick connection with the Old Town. It is situated 2.6 km from the Łagiewniki Train Station. The Wawel Royal Castle is a 13-minute drive away.

name: Spatz Aparthotel
description: The elegant Spatz Aparthotel is situated in Kraków’s Kazimierz district, just 100 metres from the Tempel Synagogue. It offers comfortable rooms with a tea and coffee-making facilities and free internet. All luxurious rooms at the Spatz are elegantly furnished and have laminated floors. Each comes with an LCD TV with cable channels. All have a work desk, mini bar, safe and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Iron and iron board is available upon request. The helpful front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information and assist with luggage storage. Bicycle rental and tour booking is available. Buffet breakfasts with hot meals are available. Spatz Aparthotel is located within a 16-minute walk from the beautiful Main Market Square. It is surrounded by atmospheric cafés and pubs of Kazimierz.

name: Hotel Wawel Queen
description: Attractively located in Kraków, Hotel Wawel Queen features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Hotel Wawel Queen can enjoy a continental breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Hotel Wawel Queen offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from Hotel Wawel Queen, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Secesja
description: Located just 5 minutes’ walk from the Wawel Castle, the 3-star Hotel Secesja offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. A large and varied buffet breakfast is served daily. All rooms at the Secesja are comfortably furnished and decorated with stylish details. Each comes with satellite TV and a modern bathroom with either a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. Secesja’s elegant bar and restaurant specialises in traditional Polish as well as international dishes. Front desk staff is available 24/7, ready to provide tourist information and sightseeing directions. Hotel Secesja is situated in a quiet area of the Kazimierz Jewish District. Karków's beautiful Main Market Square is only 1.3 km away. It is also close to major shopping centres such as Krakowska, Bonarka and Kazimierz. ICE Kraków Congress Centre is 900 metres away.

name: Hotel Galicya
description: The 3-star Hotel Galicya is located within a 10-minute tram ride of Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square. It offers spacious rooms with Wi-Fi and satellite TV. All rooms at the Galicya come with a working space. Each has a modern bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms have tea and coffee-making facilities. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in Polish and international dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or arrange bicycle rental. Luggage storage and shuttle service are available. Hotel Galicya is located within just a 10-minute drive of the Wawel Royal Castle. Private parking is available at a surcharge.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow City Center
description: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Krakow City Center is located in central Kraków, only 950 m from Wawel Castle, 750 metres from the Old Town and 350 metres from the Vistula Boulevards. The property features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Modern, design rooms here feature six changing light colours and will provide you with a large, flat-screen TV with cable channels and bathroom has heated floors, a lit rainshower, towels and free toiletries. At the property you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden with a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a games room. Shuttle services, parties and trips can be arranged at extra charge. Virtual concierge and a business centre are available. It is 600 metres from National Museum of Krakow. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11,5 km away.

name: Novum House
description: No description found

name: Ibis Styles Krakow East
