description: The hotel is located in the greenest district of Krakow, Nowa Huta, which ranked 1st in the TOP 10 best areas to live in Europe in the British newspaper The Guardian. The hotel has 63 air-con rooms, decorated in a modern style and a conference room. Beds are extremely comfortable thanks to the special Sweet Bed mattresses. We meet the requirements of all market segments of both business and tourism.accorhotels.com

name: Art of Serenity
description: No description found

name: Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa
description: The 5-star Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa is located at the Kraków’s Vistula riverbank, just 1.5 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. It features modern spa facilities, spacious rooms and free WiFi, All air-conditioned rooms at the Niebieski are bright and decorated with warm colours. Each has a large LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can benefit from a minibar and a safe. Free water, tea and coffee are provided. The on-site Vanilla Spa offers a wide selection of spa treatments. Guests can relax in a sauna or work out in the fitness room. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with ticket service to main city’s attractions. A varied buffet breakfast is served at the Vanilla Sky Restaurant, which specialises in Mediterranean and Polish fusion cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the terrace with a river view. The hotel's pizzeria, Fresco, serves Italian dishes. Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa is situated within a 20-minute walk from the Old Town Kraków. It offers excellent tram and bus connections with all parts of the city.

name: Poleski Hotel
description: Featuring a Viewing Terrace that looks out over the bank of Vistula River, this 3-star hotel offers great facilities and comfortable accommodation in an ideal location. Hotel Poleski features marvellous panoramic views of the Royal Castle on the Wawel Hill and the whole city that can be enjoyed from bedrooms, the restaurant and bar. Poleski offers uncluttered rooms that are quite spacious rooms and decorated with soothing colours. All rooms have a seating area, a bathroom as well as facilities such as air conditioning, satellite TV, a hairdryer, and a refrigerator. Delight in tasty European cuisine at Poleski Restaurant as you take in lovely views of the area and toward the evening enjoy delicious cocktails during fun karaoke nights. The hotel has 2 modern, air-conditioned and fully facilitated conference rooms that accommodate up to 50 people each. During summer, guests can make use of the barbecue facilities or enjoy hiking around the area. The Main Market Square is a 15 minute walk or 5 minute drive from the hotel. Poleski Hotel also provides transport to and from Balice and Pyrzowice Airports, Krakows main railway station and coach stations, and to Warsaw upon request.

name: Szewska 22 Boutique
description: No description found

name: Golden Tulip Krakow Kazimierz
description: Featuring free WiFi and a children's playground, 4-star hotel Golden Tulip Krakow Kazimierz offers accommodation in the historic Kazimierz district of Kraków, a few steps away from the lively Wolnica Square. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Private parking is available on site. Each modern, air-conditioned room here comes with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is featured, as is a minibar and tea and coffee making set. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is a restaurant and a bar for guests to enjoy. Shuttle service is available at a surcharge. Kazimierz Jewish District is 200 metres from Golden Tulip Krakow Kazimierz, while Wawel Royal Castle is 800 metres from the property. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11 km away.

name: Betmanowska Main Square Residence Adults Only
description: Hotel Betmanowska Main Square Residence is located in the Main Market Square in the Old Town of Kraków and offers a restaurant. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 100 metres from the Cloth Hall. Rooms at Hotel Betmanowska Main Square Residence feature air conditioning and a minibar. Guests are welcomed by a cold bottle of Prosecco. There is a coffee machine and coffee/tea making facilities. Some rooms feature a hydro-massage shower, while some have a spa bath. Each private bathroom also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box. At Hotel Betmanowska Main Square Residence you will find a bar and a 24-hour front desk. The property is located 50 metres from St Mary’s Basilica. St Florian’s Gate is 400 metres away while Wawel Royal Castle is 1 km away.

name: Bonerowski Palace
address: Rynek Glowny 42/ul. Swietego Jana 1, 31-013 Krakow, Malopolskie
description: Located on Kraków’s Main Market Square in a historic tenement, The Bonerowski Palace offers rooms and luxury apartments. It is located just steps from all the attractions of Kraków’s Main Market Square and 900 metres from Kraków Główny Railway Station. Parking is 500 metres from the property. The spacious rooms and apartments feature a seating area with a work desk. Each comes fitted with a flat-screen TV offering satellite channels. Free mineral water is offered, as is access to wet and dry sauna. In the morning, Bonerowski’s guests can enjoy a hot and cold breakfast buffet. The Amalia Brasserie, set on the ground floor, is known for both modern Polish dishes and French cuisine. There is a summer/winter outdoor garden from which guests can admire the Market Square. In Royal and Ducal Hall there are meeting facilities suitable for wedding receptions, banquets and business meetings. Piano concerts take place in The Bonerowski Palace's historic Royal Hall.

name: Hotel Indigo Krakow - Old Town
description: In the heart of the city and next to Florian Gate, the largest gate into the historical city, sits the Hotel Indigo® Krakow – Old Town. Housed in a stunning 19th century building. The hotel design has been inspired by three Polish painters from different centuries and that heritage has been subtly brought into our rooms and our public areas. Old Kleparz market is opposite our hotel and we are walking distance to Krakow’s Main Square, St. Mary’s Basilica, the Clothes Hall, the main shopping street (Florianska), Wawel Castle and the Jewish district.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Warszauer Hotel
description: Set in Kraków and with Wawel Royal Castle reachable within 700 metres, Warszauer Hotel is a small luxury boutique hotel. It offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting a terrace, this property is located a short distance from St. Mary's Basilica, Town Hall Tower and Lost Souls Alley. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Warszauer Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. All rooms have designed furniture. Each room comes with free Diptyque Paris toiletries. A'la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Coffee and fresh baked cake are free all day for the guests. A'la carte restaurant Adam Gessler Popular points of interest near Warszauer Hotel include Main Market Square, Schindler Factory Museum and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Krakow
description: Located in the centre of Krakow with spectacular views of Wawel Castle over the Vistula River, the Hilton Garden Inn Kraków is the first Hilton Garden Inn in Poland. Only 7.5 miles from Balice airport, this Kraków hotel is only a few minutes walk from famous historical attractions and the Jewish quarter of Kazimierz All of the beautifully decorated, air-conditioned Guest Rooms at the Hilton Garden Inn Kraków hotel feature a generous working area, complimentary internet access, and ergonomic Mirra® chairs. Business guests will appreciate the complimentary 24-hour business center and the conference center, with 400 sqm of naturally lit meeting space and a large foyer with castle views. Keep fit in the complimentary Fitness Center or shop in Bonarka City Centre mall, visit the nearby Wieliczka Salt Mine or the Holocaust Museum in Auschwitz, or attend one of almost 3000 concerts and attractions held in the Philharmonic Hall, Slowacki Theatre and more unusual places, such as factories and open air parks. ***** Everything. Right where you need it. ®*****Hilton

name: Aneks Hotelu Kazimierz
description: Located in the heart of Kraków’s Kazimierz district, 200 metres from the Nowy Square, Aneks Hotelu Kazimierz offers air-conditioned rooms with free internet. The Aneks is situated just 600 metres from the Wawel Castle and the Vistula River. The walk to the Main Market Square takes about 17 minutes. In the morning guests can enjoy a large buffet breakfast with warm and cold products in the partner Kazimierz hotel, just 10 metres away. The rooms at Aneks Hotelu Kazimierz offer a TV with satellite channels, a tea and coffee maker and a work desk. The helpful staff at Aneks Hotelu Kazimierz can arrange sightseeing trips and provide guests with tourist information on Kraków.

name: Matejko Hotel
description: Hotel Matejko is located in the Old Town centre of Kraków, just 650 metres from the Main Market Square. It features comfortable rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi. All rooms at the Matejko are fitted with a modern bathroom with a shower. Each has a working space with a telephone and a desk, as well as a complimentary bottle of mineral water. Some have air-conditioning and a seating area. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in an air-conditioned restaurant specialising in European cuisine. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or arrange shuttle services. Hotel Matejko is situated 500 metres from the Kraków Główny Railway Station. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre is only a 2-minute walk away.

name: David Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in the centre of Kazimierz, Kraków’s Jewish district, Hotel David manages to combine a central location with quiet rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. David’s rooms feature wooden furniture and an elegant interior design. Apart from a bathroom with a shower, all rooms have a flat-screen TV and air-conditioning. An electric kettle is also provided. A breakfast buffet in the mornings at David Boutique Hotel. The Old Town’s Main Market is located 1.4 km away, and the Wawel Castle is 1 km from the hotel. The Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are 1.8 km away.

name: Ermine Suites
description: Situated in the centre of Kraków, 1.3 km from National Museum of Krakow and 400 metres from Town Hall Tower, Ermine Suites offers accommodation with free WiFi. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. A a baby safety gate is also available for guests at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near Ermine Suites include Main Market Square, Cloth Hall and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sky Hotel Kraków
description: Set in Kraków, 700 metres from Lost Souls Alley, Sky Hotel Kraków offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Sky Hotel Kraków all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Mary's Basilica, St. Florian's Gate and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 17 km from Sky Hotel Kraków.

name: Aparthotel Adler
description: Located on the border of Old Town Kraków, the Aparthotel Adler is situated within a 5-minute walk of the popular Kazimierz District. It offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. All rooms at the Adler are decorated with warm colours and come with a seating area, a safe and tea and coffee-making facilities. Each has a bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and a welcome set of free toiletries. There is a front desk, where guests can leave their luggage, as well as ask the staff for tourist information. The Aparthotel Adler is situated 2.5 km from the Main Market Square and 2 km from Wawel Royal Castle. The Podolski Boulevard, popular Vistula promenade is only 180 metres away.

name: New Port Hotel
description: Situated 1.4 km from Wawel Royal Castle in Kraków, New Port - Hotel na Wiśle features accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with bathrobes and walk-in shower. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with river or garden views. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, Italian or vegetarian options. At the aparthotel you will find a restaurant serving American, British and French cuisine. New Port - Hotel na Wiśle provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, hiking and pub crawls are possible in the surroundings. National Museum of Krakow is 2 km from the accommodation, while Town Hall Tower is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from New Port - Hotel na Wiśle, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Loft Hotel - Adults Only
description: A stay at The Loft Hotel - Adults Only places you in the heart of Krakow, within a 15-minute walk of Main Market Square and St. Mary's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is 0.5 mi (0.9 km) from Cloth Hall and 0.7 mi (1.1 km) from Krakow Barbican. Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Enjoy pizza at Incredibile, a theme restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to noon. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring tablet computers and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and minibars, as well as phones with free local calls.FarePortal

name: Garden Square Hotel
description: Set in Kraków, 4.8 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Garden Square Hotel offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 5.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum, 5.3 km from National Museum of Krakow and 5.3 km from Town Hall Tower. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Garden Square Hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna. Main Market Square is 5.3 km from Garden Square Hotel, while Cloth Hall is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Krakow Hotel & Convention Center
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Krakow, built in 2015, is within walking distance from TAURON Arena Krakow, a multi-purpose hall that hosts concerts, shows and sports competitions. The hotel is located in a green and quiet area of the city with a large 43-hectare park in the immediate vicinity. We are situated near the EXPO Krakow Fair Trade Center and many office parks. The nearest shopping center is 2 km /1.5 mi/ away. The hotel is only a 30-minute drive from Krakow Airport. Enjoy a free Spa experience in our Wellness Zone designed to revitalize and pamper you. Our hotel offers a spacious swimming pool, relaxing whirlpool bath, steam room, herbal sauna and a relaxation area. Our 150 square meter fitness center is fully equipped with a wide range of cardiovascular and strength stations. The fitness center is open 24 hours a day. Each guest room features a flat screen 40-inch TV, complimentary WiFi, spacious work desk, air conditioning, safe and refreshment center. Our hotel has a dedicated Executive Lounge, 24-hour business center and parking for 100 cars. Dine in our 5th Avenue Restaurant where we serve seasonal food that is simple, light and delicious. Unwind each evening in the contemporary Lounge Bar offering a selection of beers, spirits and cocktails.Hilton

name: Aparthotel Oberza
description: Located 40 metres from the Tempel Synagogue in Kraków’s Kazimierz district, Aparthotel Oberża offers design rooms and apartments. Each has a seating area, a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Aparthotel Oberża is located in a renovated residence from the 19th century. Its rooms all feature characteristic and individual designs, heating and private bathrooms. The surrounding area features various shops, bars and restaurants. Plac Nowy is 100 metres away, and the Wawel Castle is within a 10-minute walk. Wolnica Square is within 500 metres. The front desk staff is available 9:00-18:00 and provides a car rental service. It also organises tickets. An airport shuttle service is available. The property features an à la carte restaurant that serves traditional Polish dishes. Breakfast is available in the mornings.

name: Hotel Regent
description: The 3-star Hotel RT Regent is located in Kazimierz, just a 10-minute walk of the Kraków’s beautiful Wawel Royal Castle. It offers spacious and bright rooms with Wi-Fi and satellite TV. All rooms at the Regent come with a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Each room has a work desk, while some rooms have tea and coffee-making facilities. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel dining room. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or arrange bicycle rental. A safety deposit box, luggage storage and shuttle service are available. Hotel RT Regent is located within just a 18-minute walk of the Main Market Square.

name: Metropolo By Golden Tulip
description: Situated in Kraków, 5.9 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Metropolo by Golden Tulip Krakow features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Metropolo by Golden Tulip Krakow the rooms include bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Schindler Factory Museum is 6.2 km from the accommodation, while National Museum of Krakow is 6.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 18 km from Metropolo by Golden Tulip Krakow, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Cracowdays
description: Cracowdays is located in aquiet part of Kraków Old Town, a 10-minute walk from the Main Market Square. It offers intimate atmosphere and rooms with air conditioning, flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi. The Cracowdays’s rooms feature a stylish interior design and brickwork elements. Access to a fully equipped kitchen is provided. The Cracowdays multilingual staff provide a ticket service and tour information. The hotel runs an airport shuttle service. Guests can a bicycle directly at the hotel. Public parknig is available at a surcharge. Wawel Castle is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Jan
description: Hotel Jan is situated in a 600 year old townhouse in the very centre of the Kraków Old Town, 100 metres from the Main Market Square. It offers a 24-hour front desk and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The rooms are bright and boast elegant interiors. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an electric kettle, a refrigerator, a safe, and a private bathroom with a shower. Breakfast is served in the mornings in the common breakfast room. Hotel Jan is 500 metres from the Wawel Royal Castle and 1 km from the historic Jewish quarter of Kazimierz. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre and Kraków Główny Train Station are about 1.1 km away.

name: Kolory Guest House
description: Located in the heart of Kraków’s Kazimierz district, Kolory Guest House offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. They all feature private bathrooms with a hairdryer and towels The rooms at the Kolory are bright and are decorated with Polish folk art. For guests’ convenience, a fan has been included in each. Some have a balcony. Kolory Guest House is located just next to New Square (Plac Nowy), in an area featuring many restaurants, cafés and pubs. The Tempel Synagogue is 100 metres away, and the Wawel Castle is within 1 km away. The Kolory’s staff is available from 9 a.m. until 2 p.m; and offers a tour desk and ticket service. In addition, there is a shop with works of folk art at the property.

name: Amber Boutique Hotels - Amber Design
description: Located a 6-minute walk from the Old Town Market Square and 1.7 km from Wawel Castle, 4-star Amber Boutique Hotels - Amber Design offers classically furnished, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel features a historic staircase and many stylish Art-Nouveau décor features. Every room in Amber Boutique Hotels - Amber Design has soundproofed windows, a fridge and a safe, family rooms and studios are available too. Each features tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an electric kettle as well as a bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. An iron is available upon request. Guests have at their disposal a sauna and a mini-fitness room. Laundry and dry cleaning service are also available. The hotel staff, available 24 hours a day, can arrange for an airport pick-up. Buffet breakfast is served every day from 7 a.m. till 10 a.m. in the hotel's restaurant. Vegan, gluten-free, or lactose-free options are available on request. Guests are also offered free tea and coffee in the rooms. It is 1 km to Kraków Główny Train Station, as well as Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre.

name: Vienna House Easy Cracow
description: Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Cracow is located in a walking distance from the center of Kraków, 900 metres away from the Kraków Główny Railway Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free, reliable and fast WiFi. Paid private parking is available too. The hotel's cosy yet modern and functional rooms have a private bathroom and a work desk. A varied and tasty breakfast with both hot and cold products is available in the morning. In the evenings guests may visit the hotel bar. Front desk staff at the Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Cracow are available 24 hours a day. Guests can use the hotel fitness centre for free, while sauna access is extra charged. The hotel also provides guests with a private taxi service. Vienna House Easy by Wyndham Cracow is situated about 1,5 km from the Main Market Square. The Wawel Castle is 2 km away. It`s located very close to the business districts, Tauron Arena, Opera Krakowska and Regional Courts.

name: Aparthotel Grodzka 21
description: Situated in the heart of Kraków, Apartamenty Grodzka 21 is less than 200 metres from the Main Market Square and 400 metres from the Wawel Royal Castle. It offers self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi and air-conditioning. The rooms and apartments are classically decorated in pastel colours and feature parquet floors. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, a desk, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom with a shower. Located by the All Saints Square, Grodzka 21 is within immediate reach of numerous restaurants and cafes. Apartamenty Grodzka 21 is located 1 km from Kraków Główny Train Station and from the Kraków Błonie Park. The historical Jewish quarter of Kazimierz is 900 metres away.

name: Farmona Hotel Business & Spa
description: Located in a quiet area of Kraków, Farmona Hotel Business & SPA offers a wide range of spa treatments and a varied breakfast. Elegant rooms come with a balcony and free Wi-Fi. The Farmona’s spa features a sauna. Guests can also relax with a massage by professional Balinese and Thai therapists. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Farmona Hotel Business & SPA come with an LCD TV with satellite channels. All have a work area with a desk and a laptop safe. Mineral water is offered in the room for free. Farmona’s Magnifica Restaurant has a bar area with a fireplace and serves European dishes. A summer terrace is also available. Farmona offers facilities for children, such as a playground with a swing and a slide, as well as a games room, special plastic cutlery, colouring books and baby proofed wardrobes and sockets. The complex is located in Kraków’s Łagiewniki district, next to a large park, a 20-minute bus ride from the beautiful city centre. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Hotel Zakliki
description: Featuring air conditioning, Zakliki Aparthotel is situated in Kraków, 250 metres from Kraków Zakliki train stop offering connections to Kraków Balice Airport. Wisla Krakow Stadium is within 5 km while Cracovia Stadium is 6 km away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units feature a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. In some rooms a microwave and kettle are also available. Some units also have a kitchenette, fitted with a fridge and stovetop. Each unit comes with a private bathroom with shower. The hotel offers free private parking on-site National Museum of Krakow is 6 km from Zakliki Aparthotel. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Hotel Batory
description: The family run 3-star Batory Hotel is situated a short walk from Kraków's Old Town. It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Free private parking is available on-site, subject to availability. The Batory is in a quiet area, even though it is only 1 km from the Main Market. The Wawel Castle is 1.4 km away. Kazimierz is within 950 metres of the hotel. The Batory’s spacious rooms feature a classical design. All have a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Each room has heating. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is available here. In the summer guests can have their meals in the garden. The staff is available 24/7 and organises tours of the area and surrounding points of interest. It also provides guests with tourist information.

name: Leone Aparthotel
description: Located on the border of Kraków’s Old Town and the trendy Jewish quarter, Kazimierz, Leone Aparthotel offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi and 24-hour front desk. The Main Market Square is 800 metres away. The elegant interior features 19th-century elements including stylish wooden stairs. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities, as well as safety deposit box. A private bathroom is equipped with a shower and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet every morning in the restaurant located 750 m from the property. There are numerous bars and restaurants in the area. Leone Aparthotel also offers additional services, such as an airport shuttle, car rental or sightseeing tours. Kraków Główny Train Station is about 1.2 km away and the Wawel Castle is 1 km from Leone Aparthotel.

name: Platinum Suites
description: Platinum Suites is located in the city centre, by the Main Train Station. It offers accommodation in modern apartments with free, fast Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. Each apartment includes a private bathroom with shower, as well as a well-equipped kitchen to cook in. There is a seating area to relax in, as well as a table to enjoy meals at. There is a restaurant in the building where guests can order lunch. Platinum Suites is situated only 700 metres from the Old Town and 2 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. The trendy Kazimierz district is 1.5 km away.

name: Dietla 32 Residence
description: Dietla 32 Residence - ideal location in the heart of Krakow, between Main Square and Kazimierz District provides accommodation within 1.3 km of the centre of Kraków, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware. The aparthotel offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. Walking tours can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Dietla 32 Residence - ideal location in the heart of Krakow, between Main Square and Kazimierz District include Wawel Royal Castle, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: ibis Krakow Stare Miasto
description: The hotel is located in the center of Krakow, a 15-minute walk from the old town and near to the train station and the bus station, which is only a 30-minute ride from Krakow-Balice Airport. Our comfortable rooms are what ibis is all about. Together with our spacious ibis Kitchen restaurant and modern conference space, they guarantee an enjoyable stay in Krakow.accorhotels.com

name: Cracow Riverside Aparthotel
description: No description found

name: Golden Tulip Krakow City Center
description: Golden Tulip Krakow City Center offers an excellent location in the city centre, only 500 metres from the Kraków Main Square and within a walking distance from the Old Town tourist attractions. There is free Wi-Fi available. Air-conditioned and decorated with earth tones, all rooms at the Golden Tulip feature classic design. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a wardrobe. The bathroom is equipped with a shower. The hotel provides a lift and a conference room. All areas at Golden Tulip Krakow City Center feature air conditioning. The internet point is also available. Guests can order a meal at the à-la-carte restaurant on site or enjoy a drink at the hotel bar. The Golden Tulip is situated only 150 metres from the Planty Park and 2 km from the Wawel Castle. The nearest tram stop is just 100 metres away. Kraków Main Railway Station and Bus Station are both within 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: ibis Krakow Centrum
description: We are right next to the Poland boulevards with convenient access to Wawel Castle, Old Town and Kazimierz. Our location offers easy access to the airport and other important places in Krakow. Comfortable rooms, a spacious Ibis Kitchen restaurant, underground parking and the neighborhood of our fraternal hotel Novotel Krakow Centrum guarantees a pleasant stay in the royal city.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Gródek
description: Hotel Gródek is a 5-star boutique hotel, located in a quiet area of the Old Town of Kraków. Its individually designed rooms offer an LCD TV and free internet access. All air-conditioned rooms and apartments at the Gródek are fitted with satellite TV and a minibar. Each comes with an electric kettle and a refrigerator. Bathrooms offer floor heating and a hairdryer. Free bottle of mineral water and newspapers are offered. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served at the Gródek Restaurant, which specialises in quality Polish cuisine. Guests can relax in a beautifully appointed bar with a library and a fireplace. Front desk staff can assist guests 24 hours a day and can help with car rental or tickets booking. For more relaxation, guests can head to the sauna and massage parlour. At the Hotel Gródek, guests will be right in the very heart of Kraków, within a 3-minute walk of St. Mary’s Basilica and many cafés and restaurants around the Main Market Square. Kazimierz Jewish District is just one kilometre away.

name: Apartamenty Bonerowska 5
description: Apartamenty Bonerowska 5 offers accommodation in the centre of Kraków, 450 metres from the Planty Park surrounding the Old Town and 850 metres from the Main Square. Bonerowska 5 Apartments are located in two buildings: one on Bonerowska 5 and the other on Bonerowska 2. In the building at 5 Bonerowska Street there is the reception and apartments/studios: Studio, Deluxe, Superior, Executive and Studio with sofa. In the building at Bonerowska 2 there are Standard Apartments. Each apartment comes with a bedroom and a bathroom with a shower. There is a flat-screen, satellite TV in every room. Most apartments feature a kitchenette. WiFi is available at no charge. The property staff can arrange for an airport shuttle, car rental or provide ticket service or tourist information. Ironing facilities can be provided upon request. Cloth Hall is 700 metres from Apartamenty Bonerowska 5. The nearest airport is John Paul II Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Turnau City Aparthotel
description: Luxurious apartments Turnau- Angel City Aparthotel are housed in a modern complex in Kraków’s centre, 8 minutes’ walk from the Main Railway Station. All offer internet and fully equipped kitchenettes. The apartments at the Turnau- Angel City Aparthotel come with a kitchenette, equipped with a refrigerator, cooker, microwave and all the necessary dishes and kitchen utensils. At the Turnau- Angel City Aparthotel, you will be just 10 minutes’ walk from Kraków’s Main Market Square. Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre is only a few steps away. A restaurant, where guests can have breakfast, can be reached in 2 minutes on foot.

name: Browar Lubicz Residence
description: Located 500 metres from St. Florian's Gate and less than 1 km from Lost Souls Alley in the centre of Kraków, Browar Lubicz Residence provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers a children's playground. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Browar Lubicz Residence can arrange a bicycle rental service. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Mary's Basilica, Krakow Central Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 18 km from Browar Lubicz Residence.

name: Boutique Aparthotel & Apartments
description: Set in the centre of Kraków, 300 metres from St. Mary's Basilica and 400 metres from Lost Souls Alley, Boutique Aparthotel offers accommodation with free WiFi. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and walk-in shower. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a fridge. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. A bicycle rental service is available at Boutique Aparthotel. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Florian's Gate, Wawel Royal Castle and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Boutique Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Floryan Old Town
description: The Hotel Floryan is located in a 16th century building located in a pedestrian zone in Kraków’s Old Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms in the city’s centre. The Hotel Floryan Old Town’s rooms have wooden floors. All come equipped with a satellite TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. Later in the day the restaurant serves lunch and dinner, mostly focusing on Italian and Polish dishes. Kraków’s Main Market, which has such landmarks as St. Mary’s Basilica and Drapers Hall, is 280 metres away. The Kraków Główny Train Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are within 550 metres. The Floryan's staff is available 24 hours a day. They can help guests organise a trip or provide an airport shuttle. The property also has a limited number of free parking spaces located 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Novotel Krakow Centrum
description: A place of many possibilities just a few steps from the attractions of Krakow. It offers 198 spacious rooms, most with a view of the Vistula Bend. The offer includes conference rooms, a restaurant, a bar, a children's corner and a recreation centre with swimming pool - all this makes it ideal for a family, business and tourist stay. It is distinguished by an apartment with a terrace where you can admire the panorama of the city with a coffee, or organize an unforgettable celebration in the open air.accorhotels.com

name: Aparthotel Bc 29 Residence
description: Located in Kraków, BC 29 Residence is situated in the heart of Kazimierz Jewish District. Wawel Royal Castle is 800 metres away. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. This is a self-catering accommodation with a 24-hour reception. The pet-friendly accommodation is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a fully equipped kitchenette, fitted with an oven. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Every unit features a private bathroom with free toiletries. Towels are offered. Breakfast catering delivered to a guest's room is available on request. Galeria Kazimierz is 900 metres from BC 29 Residence, while Schindler Factory Museum is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 11 km from BC 29 Residence.

name: Qubus Hotel Krakow
description: Qubus Kraków Hotel is located in a quiet, yet central area of Kraków, next to the Vistula River. It features a swimming pool and a hot tub located on the top floor with impressive views of the city. All air-conditioned rooms at the Qubus are fitted with free WiFi and satellite TV. Each comes with a fridge and a safety deposit box. Most bathrooms have a bathtub. In the morning guests can enjoy an award-winning breakfast buffet. The Qubus Kraków Hotel’s restaurant, specialises in Polish and European cuisine. The hotel breakfast consists of over 100 fresh products, including regional smoked sausages, cheese, salads and hot dishes. Front desk staff speaks excellent English and is available 24 hours a day. Guests can benefit from a fitness centre with a gym, a sauna and a steam bath. Qubus Kraków Hotel is situated in a beautiful area of Podgórze District, within a 5-minute walk from Kazimierz Jewish District. The Main Market Square is just 2 kilometres away.

name: Puro Krakow Stare Miasto
description: The modern and stylish PURO Kraków Stare Miasto is located just 1 km away from the beautiful Main Market Square. It offers accommodation with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at Puro are decorated in light colours and feature large windows. Each comes with modern equipment including a tablet, a 49-inch flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Floors are heated and the bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries. There is a lounge at the hotel where guests can relax. The HINT Kraków is a gastropub where guests can enjoy variety of classic dishes in new versions and a cuisine based on comfort food. Kraków Główny Train Station is just about 200 metres and so is the popular shopping mall Galeria Krakowska.

name: Cybulskiego Guest Rooms
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and tour/ticket assistance.Expedia

name: Downtown Kraków
description: The 3-star Hotel Downtown Kraków is situated just 150 metres from the Kraków Główny Railway Station. It offers bright and spacious rooms with a minibar and free internet. Buffet breakfast is served daily. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Downtown Kraków are classically furnished and decorated with warm colours. Each comes with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel is located within a 10-minute walk from the Kraków’s Main Market Square. The popular Galeria Krakowska shopping centre is just 400 metres away. The front desk staff of Hotel Downtown Kraków is available 24 hours a day and can arrange museum tickets as well as city tours in Kraków or Wieliczka. Luggage storage and a safe are also available.

name: Lwowska 1
description: Situated in Kraków, Lwowska 1 offers a spa centre and sauna. Schindler Factory Museum is 400 metres from the property. Private parking is available on site. The pet-friendly accommodation is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units feature a dining area and/or balcony. A fridge and kettle are also featured. Some units also have a kitchenette, equipped with a stovetop. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. The aparthotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The property also offers mini-market. There is a 24-hour front desk at Lwowska 1. Galeria Kazimierz is 800 metres from Lwowska 1, while Kazimierz Jewish District is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Liv'Inn Aparthotel
description: Liv'Inn Aparthotel offers modern rooms and apartments located in the centre of Kraków, within walking distance of the Old Town and Kraków Główny Train Station. All units come with free unlimited Wi-Fi access and a 40" TV with satellite channels. The rooms and apartments at Liv'Inn Aparthotel come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. They are also equipped with a refrigerator or a minibar and a safe. The apartments come with a fully equipped kitchen, as well as seating and dining areas. Some feature a balcony. Liv'Inn Aparthotel offers will be happy to arrange an airport shuttle or help with organising sightseeing tours. From Liv'Inn Aparthotel guests can quickly get to Kraków’s Main Railway Station, which is a 9-minute drive away. The Main Market Square is a 15-minute walk from the aparthotel and there are convenient public transport services nearby.

name: Domus Mater Hotel
description: Domus Mater is located in the Kraków’s Podgórze district. It offers tastefully designed rooms and free Wi-Fi. There also is a green garden with a terrace, as well as monitored parking. Kraków Arena and the EXPO Kraków Exhibition and Convention Centre are both less than 4 km away. Every room is modernly furnished in hotel standard. It features a bathroom that has a shower and a hairdryer. Domus Mater features an elevator and a library.There is a 24-hour chapel and a gift shop offering books, as well as two conference rooms. Every morning in the dining room a breakfast buffet is served. Cold and hot beverages are served 24 hours a day. Meals can be ordered during daytime. The reception staff is at your service round-the-clock. Kraków’s Old Town is located 4,5 km away from Domus Mater. It is 5,2 km from Kraków Główny Train Station. Vistula River is 1 km away. Wawel Castle is 4,6 km from Domus Mater.

name: Hotel Maksymilian
description: The 3-star Hotel Maksymilian is housed in a 19th-century building situated only a 10-minute walk from the Kraków’s Main Market Square. It features rooms with free Wi-Fi, air-conditioning and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Tea, coffee and bottled water is provided in the rooms. All spacious rooms at the Maksymilian are classically furnished and decorated with warm colours. Each comes with a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information or assist with luggage storage. Massage treatments can also be arranged. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in a hotel’s breakfast room. Room service is available. Hotel Maksymilian is located 2 km from Kraków Główny Railway and Bus Station. Wawel Royal Castle is just a 20-minute walk away.

name: Art & Garden Residence
description: Art & Garden Residence offers accommodation in central Kraków, 1 km from St. Florian's Gate. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet served in a restaurant. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. Each air-conditioned room features industrial design and artwork, and includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Some rooms also come with a balcony and a city view, while other offer a garden view. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Each room has a free bottle of water, a kettle and a set for making coffee or tea. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is also a conference room and a lift, as well as paid monitored private parking. Cloth Hall is 1.2 km from Art & Garden Residence, while Galeria Krakowska is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Forest Hotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 6 km from Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium, Forest Hotel features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a garden. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Forest Hotel. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Wawel Royal Castle is 5 km from Hotel Wolski, while Wisla Krakow Stadium is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Airport Kraków–Balice Airport, 5 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Nowa Panorama
description: Hotel Nowa Panorama is located in the city centre, in Kraków’s Łagiewniki district. The hotel offers rooms with free WiFi and free on-site parking in a quiet part of the city. Panorama’s rooms feature wooden furniture and private bathrooms with showers. Each room has a work desk, as well as a TV set. The hotel is located 3,5 km from Old Town. The Sanctuary of God's Mercy in Łagiewniki is only 1,5 km away. Conference Centre ICE Kraków International Conferences & Entertainment is 2.5 km away while Jagiellonian University Campus is 1.6 km away. Twardowski Rocks Park and Zakórzwek Lake are 1.5 km from the property. A bus stop is 50 metres away from the hotel and there is a 24h supermarket nearby.

name: Aparthotel Delta Boutique
description: No description found

name: Old Town Residence Bis
description: Situated within 700 metres of Town Hall Tower and 800 metres of Main Market Square in the centre of Kraków, Old Town Residence Bis features accommodation with free WiFi. Featuring a kitchenette with a fridge and a stovetop, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. A car rental service is available at the apartment, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Old Town Residence Bis include Cloth Hall, National Museum of Krakow and Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Puro Kraków Kazimierz
description: PURO Kraków Kazimierz is set in vibrant district of Kraków and provides a fitness centre and a terrace. You can rent a bike free of charge (when weather conditions are good). Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a bar and on-site dining. Galeria Kazimierz is 300 metres away. At PURO Kraków Kazimierz, each room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all guest rooms at PURO Kraków Kazimierz have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a seating area. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at PURO Kraków Kazimierz can enjoy a breakfast, MAK bread & coffee place, Halicka restaurant and Prisma SPA. PURO Kraków Kazimierz offers a sauna*, 2 external terraces and garden. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Polish. Schindler Factory Museum is 900 metres from PURO Kraków Kazimierz, while Wawel Royal Castle is 1.1 km from the property. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11 km away. * Sauna is open for guests from Monday till Thursday between hours 4pm-10pm (from 7 am at the request of the guest, from Friday till Sunday sauna is open between 7am-10pm).

name: CDR
description: Set in Kraków, 1.4 km from the centre and less than 1 km from Wawel Royal Castle, CDR offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with garden or inner courtyard views. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and the aparthotel can arrange a bicycle rental service. Popular points of interest near CDR include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Town Hall Tower. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Aparthotel Basztowa
description: No description found

name: Nobilton Hotel
description: Offering free internet access and comfortable accommodation, this cosy hotel is situated just 10 minutes walk from the lively Jewish Quarter of Krakow and 5 minutes from the Wawel Castle. Nobilton Hotel is also conveniently located opposite the National Museum of Krakow and within walking distance of the picturesque Old Town, Market Square. The railway station can be reached in a 15 minute drive, and the airport in 20 minutes. Breakfast buffet is served in a traditional restaurant and is a great start to your day. The restaurant also offers traditional Polish cuisine, to make your stay at our hotel becomes even more special. After a busy day of sightseeing or business meetings, guests can relax in the privacy of their rooms, watch satellite TV and check mails. The hotel is fully accessible for wheelchairs.

name: Dream Boutique Residence
description: Situated in Kraków, less than 1 km from St. Mary's Basilica and 800 metres from the centre, DReAM Boutique Residence features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. A fridge and kettle are also available. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available each morning at the property. DReAM Boutique Residence provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lost Souls Alley, Wawel Royal Castle and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from DReAM Boutique Residence, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Das Hostel
description: Featuring a shared lounge, Das Hostel is set in the centre of Kraków, 1.1 km from National Museum of Krakow. The property is close to Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium, Wisla Krakow Stadium and Galeria Krakowska. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from Das Hostel.

name: The Bridge Suites
description: Set in Kraków, The Bridge Suites offers a restaurant and river views, 2.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum and 2.2 km from Wawel Royal Castle. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and shower. Guests at The Bridge Suites can enjoy a continental breakfast. The property has an individual style that combines modernity and the history of the region. The interior design is inspired by historic buildings, the work of craftsmen and Krakow artists of the new generation. Town Hall Tower is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Main Market Square is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 23 km from The Bridge Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rembrandt Aparthotel
description: Rembrandt Aparthotel is located in the heart of Kraków's Old Town, just a few steps from the Main Market Square. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. The rooms at Rembrandt Aparthotel come with an en-suite bathroom. The apartments offer satellite TV and a refrigerator. Guests are within short walking distance of all the attractions in Kraków’s Old Town, like the Cloth Hall or St. Mary’s Basilica. Kazimierz Jewish District is only 10 minutes’ walk from the property. This aparthotel features a 24/7 reception. Breakfast is available in the restaurant downstairs.

name: B&B Hotel Krakow Centrum
description: In a prime location in the Debniki district of Kraków, B&B HOTEL Krakow Centrum is located 1.1 km from Wawel Royal Castle, 1.6 km from National Museum of Krakow and 2 km from Town Hall Tower. The property is set 1.7 km from Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium, 3.2 km from Lost Souls Alley and 4.1 km from Wisla Krakow Stadium. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units at B&B HOTEL Krakow Centrum include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking English and Polish at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near B&B HOTEL Krakow Centrum include Main Market Square, Cloth Hall and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Premier Krakow Hotel
description: The elegant 4-star Premier Kraków Hotel features a swimming pool and a sauna that guests have free access to. It is located within a 10-minute drive of the Kraków Old Town, which is also accessible directly via public transport. Situated in the northern part of the city, it also 10 km from Kraków Balice Airport. All rooms at the Premier Kraków are soundproofed, air-conditioned and have an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each comes with a tea and coffee-making facilities and a safe. The spacious rooms come with free WiFi. Ironing facilities are available on request. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Impresja, which specialises in international dishes. At the Act Café Bar guests can enjoy coffee or a drink. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange transfer to the city centre. Luggage storage and room service are available. Private parking is available on site.

name: ibis budget Krakow Stare Miasto
description: The ibis budget Krakow Stare Miasto hotel is the perfect choice for those traveling to the capital of Lesser Poland and seeking good quality at an affordable price. Our main advantages include our perfect location right next to the railway station and sho pping center and being greeted by a welcoming smile. Breakfast is served in the form of a buffet. A great hotel and an even better price.accorhotels.com

name: Cracow Old Town Guest House
description: No description found

name: Jordan Guest Rooms
description: Centrally located, Jordan Guest Rooms offers easy access to Krakow's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. The front desk is open 24 hours, and a buffet breakfast is available every morning. This 3-star guest house offers an express check-in and check-out feature, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. Airport transfers and a wake-up service are available upon enquiry. Jordan Guest Rooms provides 25 rooms, each with an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a desk. Honeymoon suites are also available. Jordan Guest Rooms houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood features several bars and restaurants with a choice of varied cuisines. Krakow's attractions, such as the Historical Museum of Krakow, Cloth Hall and Main Market Square, are within easy walking distance of Jordan Guest Rooms. The guest house is also located near the area's popular clubs and pubs, plus Jagiellonian University and the Academy of Music in Krakow are a 20-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Hotel Delta
description: Just a 10-minute walk from the Main Market Square, Hotel Delta offers affordable accommodation, an intimate environment and a friendly staff. All the rooms of the Delta have en suite facilities and satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire building. The hotel common dining room is a great place to start your day with delicious breakfast, relax over a drink and meet other travellers. In the big lobby there is a stand with free internet access. Most of the Old Town attractions, including the Royal Road with the Town Hall Tower and Wawel Hill, are within walking distance of Hotel Delta. Krakow Glowny Railway Station is 1.5 kilometres away. Join a walking tour around Krakow or rent a bicycle and explore the city in style. Day trips to Auschwitz, Zakopane and the Wieliczka Salt Mine are also available.

name: Great Polonia Kraków Kazimierz
description: Located in Kraków’s Kazimierz Jewish District, just 200 metres from the Old Synagogue, Great Polonia Kraków Kazimierz offers spacious rooms with satellite TV. Internet is free at the hotel. The rooms at the Great Polonia Kraków Kazimierz have a large bathroom with a hairdryer. All feature a work area with a desk and a telephone. They offer the view of the old buildings, churches and synagogues. Great Polonia Kraków Kazimierz is situated just 10 minutes’ walk from the Wawel Castle. The Main Market Square is about 20 minutes’ walk away. A varied breakfast with hot and cold products is served daily at Great Polonia Kraków Kazimierz. The hotel organises conferences and weddings. The helpful staff at the Great Polonia Kraków Kazimierz are available 24 hours a day and offer tips on what to do and see in Kraków.

name: U Pana Cogito
description: No description found

name: Hotel Logos
description: The 3-star Hotel Logos Kraków is located in the centre of Kraków, just a 9-minute walk from the Main Market Square. It offers classically furnished rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as welcome tea and coffee. All rooms at the Logos are decorated with pastel colours and come with a minibar and satellite TV. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Mineral water and free toiletries are provided. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service and assist with luggage storage. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel restaurant, which offers a variety of dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Hotel Logos Kraków is situated within a 16-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. The city’s main railway station, the Kraków Główny, is 1.5 km away.

name: Station Aparthotel
description: Station Aparthotel is located just next to the Kraków Główny Railway Station, a 5-minute walk to the Old Town. It features rooms with free Wi-Fi and toiletries. All rooms at the Station Aparthotel are functionally equipped and some have shared bathroom. The helpful front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide tourist information, assist with luggage storage, bicycle rental or booking a tour. There is a computer with the internet connection that guests can use in the lobby. Shuttle services are available at surcharge. Station Aparthotel is located within 2.5 km from the Wawel Royal Castle and same distance from the famous Kazimierz District.

name: Park Inn by Radisson Krakow
description: Park Inn by Radisson Krakow is a modern 4-star hotel is located in the centre of Kraków, within a 15-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle and 100 metres from the ICE Conference Centre, as well as from 300 metres from the Vistula River Boulevards. It features spacious and colourful air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, free tea and coffee and a minibar, as well as an LCD TV. Apart from that, the rooms have a seating area. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and a sauna. There is a large foyer, a well equipped conference centre, as well as an underground parking. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for concierge services. A varied breakfast buffet is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, the RBG Bar & Grill, which specialises in burger and salad dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel bar. 3-course meals are available. Park Inn by Radisson Krakow is situated within a 10-minute walk of the beautiful Kazimierz Jewish District. The Main Market Square is only a 15-minute walk away.

name: Aparthotel Miodosytnia
description: Located in the heart Kazimierz, Kraków's historical Jewish district, Miodosytnia is a private elegant aparthotel close to a number of sights and trendy cafes. It offers spacious accommodation with flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The Wawel Castle on the Old Town is only 950 metres away from the hotel. Tea making facilities and towels are provided in each of our rooms. A work desk is available in some of our rooms. Each bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy their meals and drinks in Miodosytnia’s quiet garden, open all day in the high season. The 24/7 front desk offers luggage storage, as well as travel tips and concierge services. There is also an iron available upon request, and maps of Kraków.

name: Balthazar Design Hotel
description: Set in Kraków and with St. Mary's Basilica reachable within 700 metres, Balthazar Design Hotel offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also offer a patio and others also have city views. At Balthazar Design Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lost Souls Alley, Wawel Royal Castle and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from Balthazar Design Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Unicus Krakow Old Town
description: Hotel Unicus Krakow Old Town is a modern boutique property located in Kraków’s Old Town, just 210 metres from the Main Market Square. All air-conditioned rooms are beautifully designed and strictly non-smoking. Free WiFi is available. The rooms at the Unicus feature docking stations for iPod and iPhone and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can benefit from tea and coffee making facilities and a minibar. Guests can visit the Unicus’s top-class restaurant, offering delicious dishes by an award-winning chef. In the morning a varied buffet breakfast is served. The helpful reception staff is at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day and speaks excellent English. Car rental service and ticket service are available. Unicus Hotel also offers a sauna where guests can relax after a long day and a small gym. The Wawel Royal Castle is situated within a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Famous Kazimierz Jewish District with many cafés and restaurants is just 1.5 km away.

name: Boho Lofts by Loft Affair
description: Offering free WiFi, N°13 - Loft Affair is set in the centre of Kraków, just 900 metres from Galeria Kazimierz. The property is 1 km from Wawel Royal Castle and 1.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum. The 2-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with cable flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen. The apartment also includes a seating area and 2 bathrooms. St. Mary's Basilica is an 18-minute walk from the apartment, while Adam Mickiewicz Monument is 1.5 km away. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: Express Kraków Hotel
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi, Premier Krakow Hotel 2 is situated in Krakow and provides modern accommodation. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has 179 rooms and has been recently refurbished. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace offers an ideal spot to relax. The modern rooms at Premier Krakow Hotel 2 have tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and wireless internet access. They are also fitted with a hair dryer, a telephone and a shower. Those staying at Premier Krakow Hotel 2 can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally located for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Each evening, guests can relax in the cozy lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The hotel is within walking distance of Krakow Lobzow Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. Nowa Huta, Wawel Royal Castle and Main Market Square are within driving distance.HotelsCombined

name: Salve station
description: Located in Kraków, 600 metres from Lost Souls Alley and 300 metres from the centre, Salve station provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include St. Mary's Basilica, St. Florian's Gate and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 17 km from Salve station.

name: Campanile Krakow Old Town
description: The Campanile Cracovie offers accommodation in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town, by the Planty Park. Thanks to its convenient location, guests have direct access to many shops, bars, pubs and restaurants. The Campanile’s spacious and air-conditioned rooms all feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and bathrooms with a bath and a shower. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in public areas. A breakfast buffet is available in the mornings. The hotel's restaurant serves French and international dishes. Guests staying at the Campanile Cracovie will have Kraków’s most popular landmarks within walking distance. This includes St Mary’s Basilica, Cloths Hall (Sukiennice) and the Jagiellonian University. The Wawel Castle is a 14 minute walk from the hotel. Kazimierz, the old Jewish Quarter, is 1.2 km away. Kraków's main railway and shuttle bus station are within 700 metres.

name: Ginger Aparthostel
description: Ideally located in the centre of Kraków, Ginger ApartHostel offers free WiFi, a shared lounge and free private parking for guests who drive. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium, National Museum of Krakow, and Wawel Royal Castle. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and a tour desk for guests. All guest rooms come with a dishwasher, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hostel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Ginger ApartHostel. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from Ginger ApartHostel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Pollera
description: Founded in 1834, the Pollera is conveniently located within Cracow’s Old Town. St Mary’s Basilica and the Main Market are only 300 metres away from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire building. Parking is available, reservation is required. Inspired by Art Nouveau, the interior design of the Pollera features wooden furniture in darker colours. Each room has a satellite TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Complimentary mineral water is also provided. The Pollera offers a breakfast buffet in the morning. Guests can also order it directly to their rooms. Kazimierz, the old Jewish district which features several Synagogues, is 1 km away from the hotel. Guests can also choose to visit the Wawel Castle, which is 1.2 km from the hotel. The hotel is located about 8 minutes walk from the Main Railway Station.

name: Hostel Deco
description: With beautiful, Art Deco interiors not usually associated with budget accommodation, Deco is not your average hostel. Being located a few minutes from Krakow’s Old Town is certainly a bonus. Hostel Deco has a range of dormitories, as well as private rooms. This makes it an ideal choice whether you are travelling alone, as a couple or with friends and family. All the rooms are uniquely designed, offering affordable accommodation with a difference. The elegant, cosy common areas and the garden of Hostel Deco are great places to relax, make plans and meet people. Free Wi-Fi and the hostel computers allow you to keep in touch with loved ones. Breakfast is available until 12:00, so you don’t have to worry after a late night. The reception is open 24/7, so you can come and go as you please. The staff will be more than happy to share their knowledge of the city with you and help you arrange tours in and out of Krakow.

name: Aparthotel W Palacu
description: Situated in Kraków, 300 metres from St. Florian's Gate and 500 metres from the centre, Aparthotel W Pałacu features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at the aparthotel. The restaurant at Aparthotel W Pałacu specialises in Polish cuisine. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Krakow Central Railway Station, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Aparthotel W Pałacu, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: B&B La Fontaine
description: B&B La Fontaine is located in the heart of the Old Town of Kraków - on the corner of the Main Market Square. All rooms and apartments at the La Fontaine offer free Wi-Fi connection, a bathroom, satellite TV, a refrigerator and a microwave. They are situated on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a historical building. Some feature a view of the Main Market Square or the street. Airport shuttle is available at an extra charge, as well as trips to Auschwitz, Wieliczka Salt Mine, Zakopane, Częstochowa and many others.

name: Hotel Apis
description: Hotel Apis is located in Kraków, 2 km from the city centre and just by E7 exit to Warsaw. There is free Wi-Fi in all areas. The Apis's spacious and air-conditioned rooms feature a classic design, an LCD TV, carpeted floors and wooden furniture. All include a work desk and a renovated private bathroom with a shower. Free bottled water is provided. The hotel’s staff is available 24-hours a day. Guests can visit the recreational centre, relax in the sauna or enjoy a steam bath at a surcharge. The Apis’s restaurant, Mozaika Resto Bar, serves Polish and international dishes, based on natural ingredients provided by local producers. Vegetarian and gluten-free diet options are available. There is also a cafe on site. A bus stop is close to the Apis and offers transportation to Kraków’s Old Town, which is 3.6 km away. The E77 expressway is just by the hotel and national road 79 is within 650 metres. Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are both within 3 km of the Apis. There is an aqua park 2 km from the hotel and Business Quattro Park can be found within 500 metres. The distance to Kazimierz is 5 km.

name: Hotel H15 Luxury Palace
description: Set in Kraków and with St. Florian's Gate reachable within 100 metres, Hotel H15 Luxury Palace offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a fitness centre, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel H15 Luxury Palace all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near Hotel H15 Luxury Palace include Krakow Central Railway Station, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bachleda Luxury Hotel Krakow - MGallery
description: Housed in a historic building, Bachleda Luxury Hotel is an exclusive space where classical meets a touch of Krakow's Art Deco. This 5-star hotel is located in the heart of Krakow. Refined Interiors let you feel chic and elegance in an urban environment. G uests can relax in the Wellness area with swimming pool and saunas, unwind in the Opus Lounge bar or enjoy culinary journey in the GAVI restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Aparthotel Mikolaj
description: Hotel Mikołaj is ideally located just 250 meters away from the Main Market Square and other extensive cultural tourist attractions of Krakow. The hotel is a townhouse that has a warm home-away-from-home environment created by the combination of the friendly and attentive staff and its rustic interiors. All rooms have a private bathroom with a bath or a shower and each is equipped with a telephone, a radio and a TV with satellite channels. Suites consist of a cosy bedroom and a seating area and a small kitchenette. Guests enjoy easy access to many theatres, monuments, museums, and art galleries in the area. Bargain for treasures in the Main Market area, or enjoy cups of coffee in the various cafés while shopping.

name: Hotel Polonez
description: Hotel Polonez is located in central Kraków, 1,7 km from the Main Market Square. It offers classically furnished rooms with air conditioning, free WiFi and cable TV. There is also free on-site parking. All rooms at the Polonez are decorated with warm, bright tones. Each comes with a private bathroom with a shower. A hairdryer is provided. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel restaurant, which offers Polish and European dishes. Barbecue facilities are also available. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with luggage storage, store guests’ valuables in the hotel safe or arrange laundry services. Hotel Polonez is situated 500 metres from the AGH University of Science and Technology. The city’s main railway station, Kraków Główny, is 2,7 km away.

name: Ascot Premium Hotel
description: This 4-star hotel is located just 9 minutes' walk from the Kraków Main Market Square. It offers an excellent buffet breakfast and modern rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Ascot Premium Hotel feature satellite TV and a safety deposit box. All have a bathroom with a shower cabin and a hairdryer. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can provide guests with tourist information and city guides. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar serving a wide range of drinks. Ascot Premium Hotel is situated just 700 metres from the Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre. Guests can walk to the Wawel Royal Castle in just 18 minutes. Kraków Główny Railway Station is just 8 minutes' walk away. The hotel's central location enables convenient access to Arena Kraków and ICE Conference Centre, both by car and by public transport.

name: Hotel Kazimierz
description: Hotel Kazimierz is situated in an historical building, in the heart of Kraków’s Kazimierz - the former Jewish district, within walking distance of the Old Town and the historical Wawel Castle. All air-conditioned rooms at Kazimierz have a private bathroom with a shower and a toilet, as well as satellite TV and free internet access. Breakfast buffet is available every morning. Hotel Kazimierz offers a 24-hour front desk, as well as airport shuttle and free of charge luggage storage. When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of 50 PLN per pet, per night applies.

name: Xerion Hotel
description: Set 1.1 km from Schindler Factory Museum, Xerion Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Kraków and has a garden, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 2.6 km from Wawel Royal Castle, 2.7 km from St. Mary's Basilica and 2.7 km from Lost Souls Alley. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Xerion Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. St. Florian's Gate is 3.7 km from Xerion Hotel, while National Museum of Krakow is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Queen Boutique Hotel
