description: The elegant, 4-star Queen Boutique Hotel is located between Kraków’s Old Town and Kazimierz district, 700 metres from the Wawel Castle. It features stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Sauna access is free of charge. All rooms at the Queen Boutique are air-conditioned and come with tea making set. They are decorated with modern details and contrasting bright and dark colours. Each room is soundproofed and come with a safe, minibar and a seating area. Some have stunning city views. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the air-conditioned restaurant, the Amarylis. This 3-room restaurant specialises in Polish and fusion dishes. Guests can try a selection of treatments in the on-site beauty and spa facilities. Friendly front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service and provide tourist information. Thanks to its central location, there are many landmarks near the Queen Boutique Hotel. The Main Market Square is 1 km away. The Tempel Synagogue and the Planty Park are both within 450 metres.

name: Aparthotel Rakowicka Residence
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include premium bedding, a memory foam bed, towels, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Kazimierz Residence Square
description: Featuring city views and free WiFi, Kazimierz Residence Square features accommodation ideally set in the centre of Kraków, within a short distance of St. Mary's Basilica, Schindler Factory Museum and Lost Souls Alley. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or vegan options. The restaurant at the bed and breakfast specialises in Middle Eastern, Moroccan and Turkish cuisine. Popular points of interest near Kazimierz Residence Square include St. Florian's Gate, Wawel Royal Castle and Town Hall Tower. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Lubomirskiego 23 Residence - great location, 10 min to Main Square by foot, right next to Main Rail and Bus Station
description: Located in the centre of Kraków, within 1.2 km of St. Florian's Gate and less than 1 km of Krakow Central Railway Station, Lubomirskiego 23 Residence - great location, 10 min to Main Square by foot, right next to Main Rail and Bus Station provides accommodation with free WiFi. Providing a balcony, some units are air conditioned and include a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a fridge. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 18 km from Lubomirskiego 23 Residence - great location, 10 min to Main Square by foot, right next to Main Rail and Bus Station, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Résidence Tournet
description: The Tournet guest house is located in Kraków’s Jewish district of Kazimierz, just 1.2 km from the historic Main Market Square. It offers colourful and affordable rooms with free Wi-Fi. All rooms at the Tournet are simply furnished and come with an electric kettle and kitchenware. Each room has a private bathroom with either bath or shower. Most rooms have a TV. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at La Bicicletta cafe. Guests of the Tournet can make use of luggage storage service or store their valuables in the reception’s safe. Shuttle services can be arranged. The Tournet is located only 400 metres from Wawel Royal Castle. City’s main railway station, Kraków Główny, is situated 2 km away and easily accessible by public transport.

name: 1891 Garni Hotel
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Kraków, 1891 Garni Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, rooms at 1891 Garni Hotel also boast a city view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, kosher and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near 1891 Garni Hotel include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Wawel Royal Castle. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mercure Krakow Fabryczna City
description: Mercure Krakow Fabryczna City hotel is located in the historic buildings revitalized after former Polmos State Vodka Factory. This place with almost 100 years of history is part of the impressive Fabryczna City complex, because of its size it's called a city within a city.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Lavender
description: Offering a terrace, Hotel Lavender is situated in central Kraków, 700 metres from St. Florian's Gate. Galeria Krakowska is 900 metres away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each room at the property is air conditioned and featuring a mixture of modern, minimalist and traditional decor. All come with a flat-screen TV. A minibar and kettle are also provided. Every unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, toiletries and free toiletries. Bed linen is featured. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant, offering buffet and menu breakfast featuring vegetarian and vegan options. The property also offers packed lunches. There is a 24-hour front desk at Lavender. Guests can relax or meet in the common room with a bar area. Hotel Lavender is located 1 km from the Main Market Square in the Old Town. Kraków Główny Train Station is 1 km away and Wawel Royal Castle is 2 km from Hotel Lavender. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Q Hotel Plus Kraków
description: Situated in the Debniki district in Kraków, 1 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Q Hotel Plus Kraków features free WiFi access and private parking at a surcharge. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a TV. Rooms include a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Kazimierz Jewish District is 1.2 km from Q Hotel Plus Kraków, while Cracovia Stadium is 1.4 km away. Krakow - Balice Airport is 10 km from the property.

name: Z14 Boutique Residence - Krakow Old Town
description: Z14 Boutique Residence - Krakow Old Town is an aparthotel located in a renovated 19th century townhouse, within a 7-minute walk from the vibrant Kazimierz Jewish District with its numerous shops and restaurants and a 5-minute walk from the Main Market Square. All apartments have air-conditioning and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower, a hairdryer and luxury Prija toiletries. A fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Guests can benefit from luggage storage, airport shuttle service and guided tours to Auschwitz-Birkenau and the Wieliczka Salt Mine. Guarded parking is available at a surcharge. Popular points of interest near Z14 Boutique Residence - Krakow Old include Lost Souls Alley, St. Florian's Gate and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 25 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Pod Wawelem
description: Located directly under the Wawel Castle hill, Hotel Pod Wawelem offers accommodation in air conditioned rooms just by one of the Kraków’s most well-known landmarks. Furnished with wooden furniture, Pod Wawelem’s heated rooms include a work desk and a satellite TV. Electric kettles are as well provided. Free Wi-Fi is offered. The 24-hour front desk can organise an airport shuttle. A breakfast buffet is available in the restaurant. Later in the day it serves Polish and European dishes. A bar is also on-site. Free welcome drinks are offered to the guests in the restaurant located on the sixth floor, that features a terrace where guests can enjoy the view of Wawel and Vistula bend. The Planty Park and Kraków’s Old Town are within 200 metres from the hotel. Kraków Główny Railway Station is 2 km away. Pod Wawelem is directly on the Vistula River waterfront.

name: Hotel Sympozjum & Spa
description: With elegant interiors and marble floors, Hotel Sympozjum & SPA offers a range of dining and relaxation facilities, just 3 kilometres from Krakow's Old Town. All rooms at the Sympozjum come with a TV, radio and bathroom with hair-dryer and a shower. Free internet is provided. Each modern bathroom has a hair-dryer and a shower. The hotel’s restaurant, Rozmaryn, serves fine European cuisine and a wide selection of wines, while the café-bar is a great place to relax with a drink. The spa facilities of Hotel Sympozjum include saunas and massage rooms. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and will gladly assist with arranging laundry or ticket services. Hotel Sympozjum & SPA allows easy access to Krakow's tourist attractions. The beautiful Main Market Square with famous Cloth Hall is only 4 km away.

name: Apartamenty Inpoint Mogilska Tower
address: 4 plk. pil. Stefana Laszkiewicza 11, 31-445 Krakow, Malopolskie
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and washing machines, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or make use of the other amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. name: Kosmopolita Rooms
description: No description found

name: Hotel Yarden by Artery Hotels
description: Yarden Aparthotel by Artery Hotels offers elegant rooms in a central location, only an 8-minute walk from Kraków Barbican and a 14-minute walk from the Main Square. Guests can use Wi-Fi in all areas free of charge. All rooms are tastefully decorated and classically furnished. They all feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a telephone, a desk and night tables. Each bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms overlook the city or the garden. It is possible to arrange baby equipment. Guests are welcome to enjoy complimentary tea, coffee and mineral water provided in each room. Breakfast buffet is served daily. Packed lunches and special diet menus can also be arranged upon request. The garden at Yarden Aparthotel by Artery Hotels is an ideal place for a picnic. It is possible to rent a bicycle or a car on site. Massages and a variety of tours can be arranged upon request. The property is located only 2 km from the Wawel Castle. The Main Railway Station is just 1 km away.

name: Hotel Kazimierz III
description: 3-star Hotel Kazimierz III is situated in the Kazimierz Jewish District, 650 metres from the Planty Park surrounding the Old Town and 700 metres from Wawel Royal Castle. Classically furnished rooms here have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. You will find a kettle. The rooms come with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the hotel. Galeria Kazimierz is 800 metres from Hotel Kazimierz III, while Main Market Square is 1 km from the property. Krakow - Balice Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hotel Alef
description: Alef is a 3-star hotel located in central Kraków, just steps from Wawel Castle. Its rooms come with a private bathroom and a TV. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. The rooms are elegantly decorated in a combination of contemporary and traditional styles. Complementary bottle of water is provided. The hotel is located by the Kazimierz Jewish District and a 12 minutes’ walk from Kraków’s Main Market Square. Excellent tram and bus connections ensure quick access to the Main Railway Station and other parts of the city. Home-made breakfasts are available.

name: Conrad Hotel
description: Located in Kraków, Hotel Great Polonia Conrad Kraków offers air conditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi, tea/coffee facilities and a flat-screen TV with cable. There is a private paid outdoor and underground parking available on site, available upon prior reservation. The rooms of the Hotel Great Polonia Conrad Kraków all feature a classic interior design. Each is painted in bright colours and has furniture in warm colours, which includes a work desk. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer. The hotel has a restaurant serving European cuisine. There also is a café bar onsite. The Conrad is located on expressway E77. Both Balice Airport and Kraków’s centre are a 10 minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Ametyst Hostel
description: Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Ametyst Hostel is set in Kraków, 500 metres from Town Hall Tower and 400 metres from Main Market Square. The property is around less than 1 km from St. Florian's Gate, a 16-minute walk from Wawel Royal Castle and 700 metres from Lost Souls Alley. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from National Museum of Krakow. Some rooms also feature a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a stovetop. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Cloth Hall, Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from Ametyst Hostel.

name: Shalom Kazimierz
description: Set in Kraków, 1.4 km from the centre and 1.2 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Shalom Kazimierz offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Schindler Factory Museum. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 24 km from Shalom Kazimierz, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Crystal Suites Chez Helena
description: The property is located in a fully refurbished historical residence which was once the childhood home of Helena Rubinstein, the founder of the HR cosmetic brand. Set within Kraków’s old Jewish district, Kazimierz, Crystal Suites Chez Helena offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The Wawel Castle is within a 13-minute walk. The design interiors of the Chez Helena are modern and elegant, decorated mostly in white with colour elements. Each one comes with fully equipped kitchenette, a CD and DVD player as well as an iPod docking station. Kraków’s Old Town’s Main Market is within 1.4 km, and Plac Nowy, the centre of the district’s night life, is 350 metres away from the Crystal Suites. The Remuh Synagogue is less than 50 metres away. Breakfast is served in the restaurant Kolanko no 6, located 300m from our apartments. Breakfast is served in the form of a buffet and includes hot dishes (scrambled eggs, sausages, roasted vegetables), cold dishes (salads, tarts, pates, cold cuts, cheese), bread, pastries, muesli, milk, yoghurts, jams, coffee, tea, water. Breakfast is available from Monday to Sunday from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm. Breakfast for the following day can be ordered at the reception until 6:00 pm.

name: Hotel Dwor Kosciuszko
description: Located in a quiet area within Kraków’s Kościuszko Park, Hotel Dwór Kościuszko offers beautifully designed rooms with a tea/coffee maker and free Wi-Fi. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily. The air-conditioned rooms at Dwór Kościuszko feature elegant, manor-style interiors and come with antique furniture. All offer an LCD TV and a minibar. The bathroom has a heated floor, mirror and towel rack. Free bottle of mineral water and selected newspapers are offered. The Dwór Kościuszko restaurant specialises in Polish cuisine. It offers a wide range of French, Italian and Hungarian wines. A summer terrace is also available. The Dwór hotel is situated just 4 km from the Main Market Square. With excellent tram connections, guests can quickly get to the city centre.

name: Greg&Tom Beer House Hostel
description: Featuring nightly pub crawls, Greg&Tom Beer House Hostel is in Kraków's Old Town, less than 300 meters to the Market Square and 1,2 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. It features a private bar and special events including parties and live concerts. WiFi is free. Each dormitory room in Greg&Tom features lockers, reading lights and hermetically packed bedsheets. Bathroom facilities are shared. Guests have access to a common room with a TV with cable channels and a computer with an internet access and a printer, to print out tickets and boarding passes. The guest kitchen has free coffee, tea and milk available 24 hours a day. There are also free maps and city guides. Staff offers help arranging the city trips as well as trips to Wieliczka Salt Mine, Tatra Mountains, Auschwitz-Birkenau and more. Reception is available 24 hours a day and offers padlocks and a safe. Greg&Tom Beer House Hostel is 450 metres to Kraków Główny Train Station and Bus Station.

name: Grand Hotel
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel located just 100 metres from Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square. It features elegant rooms with period furnishings, full HD LED TVs, air conditioning and free wireless internet. The hotel houses Grand Signature Restaurant which specialises in traditional Polish and European cuisine. Guests can enjoy original freshly baked cakes with aromatic coffee in the Grand Café All rooms at the Grand feature classical design. Each comes with a fully equipped bathroom with a bathtub and a safety deposit box. Free bottle of mineral water and a sweet welcome treat are offered. Grand Hotel has been awarded by the Michelin Red Guide as one of the best three hotels in Kraków. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle or dry cleaning services. Kazimierz, the famous Jewish district, is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Wyspianski Hotel
description: With only a 5-minute walk of the Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square, the Hotel Wyspiański features bright rooms with satellite TV and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms at the Wyspiański come with a working space with a telephone. WiFi is available. Some rooms have tea and coffee making facilities. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in Polish and European dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink or snacks at the bar. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange room service or store guests’ valuables in the hotel safety deposit box. Hotel Wyspiański is located only a 10-minute walk of the Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre. The central location guarantees easy access to the historical Old Town, where many dining and entertainment facilities are located.

name: Crystal Suites Old Town
description: No description found

name: Novotel Krakow City West
description: The 4-star Novotel Krakow City West will surprise you with its modern interiors, a renovated fitness centre, a swimming pool and a colorful children zone. Spacious 30-metre rooms, warm colors, super-fast WiFi guarantee a comfortable stay and ideal environment for work. At Novotel we care about your well-being, so the time spent in Novo2 Lounge bar will be the perfect ending of the day.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Major Budget
description: Major Hotel is conveniently located near Balice Airport, the E77 and only 4 km from the Old City of Krakow. Rooms are modern, spacious, functional, and decorated with cheerful colours. All rooms contain an en suite, TV with free TV channels, a work desk and access to Wi-Fi internet. There are special rooms for disabled guests and separate floors for non-smokers and smokers. After a long day of exploring the historic city, return to Major Hotel and enjoy delicious Polish dishes, with elements of European cuisine at the hotels restaurant. There is a quaint winter garden and a bar that specializes in serving excellent coffee and velvety hot chocolate. The attentive personnel will provide guests with any assistance, and guarantee a friendly and cordial atmosphere. The building is also adapted to the needs of visitors with movement disabilities and there is a spacious car park on-site. Major Hotel is situated in the northern part of Krakow. The Main Market and Old Town is just a 10-minute drive away as well as the public railway or bus stations.

name: Airpark Balice
description: AirPark Balice is located in Balice. Free WiFi is available and free private parking is possible on site. The hotel can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Kraków is 11 km from AirPark Balice, while Wieliczka is 28 km away. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 1.6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Liebeskind Boutique Hotel
description: Ideally situated in the Old Town district of Kraków, Liebeskind Boutique Hotel is situated 600 metres from the Main Market Square, 600 metres from Town Hall Tower and 600 metres from Cloth Hall. The property is around less than 1 km from St. Florian's Gate and 1.2 km from Wawel Royal Castle. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Liebeskind Boutique Hotel include Main Market Square, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Airport Kraków–Balice Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Aparthotel Stare Miasto
description: Centrally located, Aparthotel Stare Miasto offers easy access to Krakow's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. It features panoramic city views and 4-star apartments. This modern property offers luggage storage, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. Aparthotel Stare Miasto offers 18 air conditioned apartments. A refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe are also included. Aparthotel Stare Miasto provides a conveniently located on-site café. Alternatively, there are a variety of other eating options in close proximity. Located in Krakow City Centre, Aparthotel Stare Miasto is surrounded by well-known bars and establishments. Situated within a short stroll are Main Market Square and the Historical Museum of Krakow.Revato

name: Hotel Daisy Superior
description: Located away from Kraków’s busy centre, Daisy Superior offers accommodation in a quiet part of the city. Its facilities include an indoor swimming pool available at a surcharge, free Wi-Fi and free parking. The property features an ice skating rink with ice skates to rent. Daisy’s heated rooms are done in warm colours. All have TV sets and DVD players, as well as private bathrooms with a shower. The staff is at guests' disposal 24 hours a day. Guests can relax in the sauna or visit the spacious hot tub. In the winter season an ice rink is available. The Daisy is 4.7 km from the city centre. The Old Town and its landmarks, such as the Wawel Castle are within 6 km. The 16th century Decjusz's Park is 550 metres away.

name: Inx Design Hotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.5 km from Schindler Factory Museum, INX Design Hotel has a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The accommodation features a business centre and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. INX Design Hotel offers certain units that include a terrace, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle. Guest rooms feature a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property. There is an on-site restaurant, which specialises in Polish, Thai and American cuisine and also offers vegetarian and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near INX Design Hotel include Wawel Royal Castle, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport is 24 km from the property.

name: Aparthotel Cracovia Residence
description: Set 200 metres from National Museum of Krakow, Aparthotel Cracovia Residence offers accommodation with a garden, a terrace and room service for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is provided. Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. A stovetop is also offered, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. A catering breakfast from a nearby restaurant is available daily, depending on the selected. option of stay. Prior order of breakfast is required. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Aparthotel Cracovia Residence can arrange a car rental service. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium, Town Hall Tower and Main Market Square. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 9 km from Aparthotel Cracovia Residence.

name: Exclusive Aparthotel Kraków Browar Lubicz
description: EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel Kraków Browar Lubicz is a self-catering accommodation located in central Kraków, 100 metres from Krakow Central Railway Station and 300 metres from Galeria Krakowska. Free WiFi is available. It is 400 metres from the Old Town of Kraków. These modern apartments will provide you with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher, hotplate and oven. Private bathroom comes with a shower or bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view. EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel Kraków Browar Lubicz offers breakfast which is served to apartments. It is 600 metres to St. Florian’s Gate and 1 km to the Main Market Square. Krakow - Balice Airport is located 12,8 km from the property.

name: Willa Retro Hostel
description: Featuring a garden, terrace and views of garden, Willa Retro Hostel is set in Kraków, 1.4 km from Krakow Central Railway Station. Popular points of interest nearby include Lost Souls Alley, Town Hall Tower and Main Market Square. The rooms include a patio. At the hostel, each room comes with a desk. With a shared bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Willa Retro Hostel also have free WiFi, while selected rooms here will provide you with a city view. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Willa Retro Hostel include Galeria Krakowska, National Museum of Krakow and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hostel.

name: Pokoje U Filipa
description: Set in Kraków, 500 metres from the centre and 400 metres from St. Florian's Gate, Pokoje U Filipa offers accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. At the bed and breakfast you will find a restaurant serving Polish, local and European cuisine. Popular points of interest near Pokoje U Filipa include Krakow Central Railway Station, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Daniel Griffin Aparthotel by Artery Hotels
description: Situated in Kraków in the Lesser Poland region, Daniel Griffin Aparthotel by Artery Hotels offers accommodation with free WiFi. Fitted with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. Some units have a balcony. Guests can enjoy breakfast in the cafe next to the aparthotel. Wawel Royal Castle is 600 metres from Daniel Griffin Aparthotel by Artery Hotels, while Kazimierz Jewish District is a 7-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel H12
description: Situated in Kraków and with Lost Souls Alley reachable within 300 metres, Hotel H12**** features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 400 metres from St. Mary's Basilica. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a patio and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Vegetarian and gluten-free breakfast options are available each morning at Hotel H12****. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Florian's Gate, Krakow Central Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Hotel H12****, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Copernicus
description: The 5-star Hotel Copernicus is housed in a Renaissance building in Kraków’s Old Town. It features beautiful, historic interiors with a sauna and swimming pool housed in the vaulted cellars. The rooms at the Copernicus are spacious and feature wooden ceilings and 14th-century decorations. All come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a luxurious, marble bathroom. Free mineral water and newspapers are offered. The air-conditioned Copernicus has a terrace with panoramic views of the Wawel. Guests can also visit the hotel restaurant, which serves seasonal Polish cuisine and is recommended by the Michelin Guide. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for dry cleaning and laundry services. Guests can try a selection of massage treatments in the on-site spa facilities. Hotel Copernicus is located just a 3-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. The Main Market Square is a 7-minute walk, while Kazimierz Jewish District is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: Avena Boutique Hotel By Artery Hotels
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.3 km from Cloth Hall and 2.1 km from the Old Town, Avena by Artery features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. A fridge and kettle are also available. The aparthotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near Avena by Artery include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Wentzl
description: Wentzl is a historical hotel, housed in a 15th-century tenement on the Main Market Square in Kraków. It offers luxurious rooms with unforgettable views of the Old Town and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Wentzl is located just steps from all the attractions of Kraków’s Old Town, including St. Mary’s Basilica. A walk to Wawel Castle and the Kraków Główny Railway Station takes only 10 minutes. The individually appointed rooms at the Wenztl come with air conditioning, satellite TV and a DVD player. All are luxuriously designed and offer tea and coffee facilities and a minibar. Wentzl Hotel houses the famous Wentzl Restaurant, founded in the 18th century and offering excellent European cuisine. The interiors are decorated with paintings by famous Polish artists. The hotel staff are at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day. They will gladly provide guests with tips on what to do and see in Kraków.

name: Aparthotel Old Town
description: Aparthotel Old Town offers accommodation in the centre of Kraków, just 450 metres from the Wawel Royal Castle and 600 metres from the Main Market Square. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided. Every room has a flat-screen TV, a minibar and coffee machine. Guests can enjoy a meal at the hotel restaurant. Adam Mickiewicz Monument is 500 metres from Aparthotel Old Town. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 10 km from Aparthotel Old Town.

name: Dream Garden Palace
description: Ideally situated in the Old Town district of Kraków, Dream Garden is situated 500 metres from National Museum of Krakow, 600 metres from Town Hall Tower and 600 metres from Main Market Square. The property is close to several well-known attractions, less than 1 km from St. Florian's Gate, an 11-minute walk from Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium and 1.2 km from Wawel Royal Castle. This pet-friendly hotel also has free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dream Garden the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cloth Hall, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 9 km from Dream Garden.

name: Hotel Petrus
description: Located 2.3 km away from the Wawel Castle, the non-smoking Hotel Petrus offers classically decorated rooms with an LCD TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms at the Petrus come with a private bathroom with a shower. There is a telephone in each room. Safety deposit box is available at the front desk. During their stay at Hotel Petrus, guests can relax in the lounge with a log fireplace and visit the summer beer garden. The hotel’s restaurant serves international specialities. Hotel Petrus is located close to the Twardowski Rocks Park and 8.9 km from the A4 motorway, leading to the Balice International Airport. ICE Conference Centre is 1.7 km away.

name: Cracow Central Aparthotel
description: Situated in Kraków in the Lesser Poland region, 500 metres to the main train station, Cracow Central Aparthotel features accommodation with free WiFi. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and shower. A fridge and kettle are also available. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. St. Mary's Basilica is 850 metres from Cracow Central Aparthotel, while St. Florian's Gate is 400 metres from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Zulian Aparthotel by Artery Hotels
description: Zulian Aparthotel by Artery Hotels offers accommodation in central Kraków, 450 metres from the Old Town. St. Florian's Gate is 700 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All classically furnished rooms here include a satellite flat-screen TV. Private parking is also available at this aparthotel. Towels and bed linen are available. Zulian Aparthotel by Artery Hotels also includes a terrace. Bike hire is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling. Galeria Krakowska and Kraków Główny Train Station are 800 metres from Zulian Aparthotel by Artery Hotels. Krakow - Balice Airport is 10 km away.

name: Atlantic Aparthotel
description: No description found

name: Flaminio Smart Sleep
description: Situated in Kraków, Flaminio Smart Sleep offers free WiFi, 100 metres from Town Hall Tower and 77 metres from Main Market Square. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Cloth Hall, Adam Mickiewicz Monument and Jagiellonian University. Krakow - Balice Airport is 10 km away.

name: Great Polonia Kraków Old Town
description: Great Polonia Kraków Old Town is situated in Kraków’s Old Town, 150 metres from the Main Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat screen TV in the completely renovated 16th century building. Thanks to its location, Kraków’s most popular landmarks, shops and restaurant are within 200 metres. This includes the Cloth Hall, St. Mary’s Basilica and Floriańska Street. Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska are both 700 metres from the hotel. The Wawel Castle is 1.2 km from the Great Polonia Kraków Old Town. The hotel serves a continental breakfast buffet. The property has an associated car parking 150m away, advance booking is required, additional charges may apply.

name: Premium Hostel
description: Located amongst a range of well-known tourist hot spots, shops and restaurants, Premium Hostel is ideal for those wishing to discover Krakow and its surroundings. Guests can also enjoy free internet access. This relaxed hostel offers a number of facilities, such as a coffee bar, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. Premium Hostel Krakow offers 24 comfortable rooms that are ideal for backpackers on a budget. Private bathrooms have a shower. Hostel guests can begin the day with a basic breakfast, before venturing out to discover the local area. Premium Hostel is also close to the area's popular restaurants and bars, and AGH University of Science and Technology is a 10-minute walk away. The Wawel Royal Castle is within an easy car ride from the hostel.Revato

name: Lorf Hostel&Apartments
description: Conveniently located in the Old Town district of Kraków, Lorf Hostel&Apartments is set less than 1 km from Cloth Hall, an 20-minute walk from Main Market Square and 1.5 km from Town Hall Tower. Among the facilities of this property are a shared kitchen and a free WiFi. The accommodation offers a room service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. A self-check-in system has been implemented. Selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge. All guest rooms feature bed linen. Guests at the hostel can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include National Museum of Krakow, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from Lorf Hostel&Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: 4.Friends Hostel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 24 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Amenities Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. This hostel also features a picnic area and barbecue grills. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at 4.Friends Hostel in Kraków (Zwierzyniec), you'll be a 5-minute drive from Kraków Zoological Gardens and 6 minutes from Cracovia Stadium. This hostel is 5.6 mi (9 km) from Main Market Square and 12 mi (19.2 km) from Wieliczka Salt Mine. name: 70s Guest Room
description: Well situated in Kraków, 70s Guest room offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. Featuring private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, full-day security and currency exchange for guests. The units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room includes a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms will provide you with a kitchen equipped with an oven. At 70s Guest room all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for cycling and pub crawls, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near 70s Guest room include Wawel Royal Castle, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 24 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hostel Centrum Sabot
description: Hostel Centrum Sabot is located in the Old Town district in Kraków, 300 metres from St. Florian's Gate and the historic Old Town area, 400 metres from Galeria Krakowska. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. Hostel Centrum Sabot features free WiFi. There is a shared kitchen at the property, where varied breakfast is served. Bathroom facilities are shared. Staff can help with tourist information. Main Market Square is 700 metres from Hostel Centrum Sabot. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 10 km from Hostel Centrum Sabot.

name: Austeria Klezmer Hois
description: Klezmer Hois guest rooms are located in the 15th century building at the very center of the Kazimierz district of Krakow. It features a peaceful garden, a restaurant, a terrace and free WiFi. Rooms at the Klezmer Hois feature antique furniture and are decorated with works of art from the past eras. Each room has a spacious bathroom with a shower and toiletries. Breakfast is served every morning. At other times, it serves traditional Galician Jewish cuisine. Original artwork hangs on the the restaurant’s walls, and there is also a well-stocked bar. Klezmer Hois is located a few minutes' walk from the center of Krakow, full of bars and nightlife. Every evening, concerts of traditional Jewish music are held in the restaurant. Kraków Airport is 16 km from Klezmer Hois.

name: W11 by Loft Affair
description: W11 by Loft Affair features accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Kraków, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. A fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near W11 by Loft Affair include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Well Well Aparthotel
description: Set in a quiet, riverside area in Kraków, Well Well Aparthotel is 800 metres from Wawel Royal Castle and 400 meters from ICE Congress Centre. Free WiFi is available on site. Modern and bright rooms here feature brickwork elements. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a toaster. A fridge and kettle are also featured. Towels and bed linen are offered. All units are air conditioned and some include a seating and/or dining area, equipped with a flat-screen TV. Well Well Aparthotel also includes a furnished terrace. National Museum of Krakow is 1.1 km from Well Well Aparthotel. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Home Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Kraków, Home Aparthotel is a design property, the interiors of which are inspired by religious imagery. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LCD satellite TV. The rooms of the Home Aparthotel feature a unique design with various religious symbols. Each one has an electric kettle and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The public spaces of the property are done in black and red, with gothic decorative elements. Guests can relax in the sauna or work out in the fitness centre. Restaurant in the cellar offers a breakfast buffet in the mornings. Kraków’s Kazimierz district is within 300 metres, and the Wawel Castle is 750 metres from the property. The Old Town’s Main Market is 900 metres from Home Aparthotel.

name: Freedom Hostel
description: Situated in the centre of Krakow, just a few minutes from the main market square, this newly-opened hostel radiates a welcoming atmosphere. Freedom Hostel offers guests 24 guest rooms with en suite facilities. Prepare your own meals in the fully-equipped kitchen area or treat yourself, after a day of sightseeing, to a tasty snack from the mini cafeteria. Valuables can be left in the reception safe free of charge. The attentive front office staff is at your service 24 hours per day and happy to organize a tour of the city for you. Relax, after a visit to the theatre, in the common living room.

name: Exclusive Aparthotel Kraków Lubicz 40
description: Offering garden views and free WiFi, EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel Kraków Lubicz 40 offers accommodation conveniently located in the centre of Kraków, within a short distance of St. Florian's Gate, Krakow Central Railway Station and Lost Souls Alley. Private parking is available on site. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near EXCLUSIVE Aparthotel Kraków Lubicz 40 include St. Mary's Basilica, Galeria Krakowska and Town Hall Tower. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 18 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Komorowski Luxury Guest Rooms
description: Located in the centre of Krakow, this luxury 4-star hotel offers rooms that feature a hydro-massage bathtub and a rain shower. Surrounded by local bars and restaurants, it is within walking distance from The Krakow Central Station. This art deco hotel offers luggage storage, a ticket service and a concierge. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide underfloor heating, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. Krakow's attractions, such as the Historical Museum of Krakow, Cloth Hall and Main Market Square, are within easy walking distance of Komorowski Luxury Guest Rooms. The surrounding area is also famous for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Amber Design Residence
description: Amber Design Residence lies in a quiet street in the heart of Krakow’s Old Town district. This boutique-style accommodation is set in an elegant 1930’s building. All rooms, suites and apartments are air-conditioned and feature bright, modern interiors. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, as well as tea & coffee facilities. Guests are welcome to relax and enjoy a coffee in the stylish lobby, decorated with vibrant artworks. Many cafes and restaurants can be found in the historic streets surrounding the Amber Design Residence. The property is located right next to the Planty Park with its old age trees. This is an exceptional urban garden surrounding the oldest part of Krakow, which was built on the site of city defense walls - a great place for walkers, lovers of running and cycling. Many of Krakow’s cultural attractions, including St Mary’s Basilica and the Cloth Hall, are within 500 metres of the accommodation. Krakow Main Station is also only a 6-minute walk away.

name: Dizzy Daisy Hostel
description: Located on a quiet street, 10 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square in Kraków Old Town, Dizzy Daisy Hostel offers a relaxing and safe base from which to explore Krakow. Dizzy Daisy Hostel occupies a 19th-century tenement house. You can choose between dormitories of different sizes, private rooms and apartments with a private bathroom and a kitchen and all modern conveniences. A wide range of amenities are at your disposal at Dizzy Daisy Hostel, free of charge. They include luggage storage, safe, bed linen and laundry. The multilingual staff is there 24/7 to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Surf freely on the internet in the common room, watch hundreds of TV channels and DVDs and meet people from all over the world. There is an all-night store close by, and the fully equipped kitchen offers the opportunity to prepare meals, as well as free coffee and tea. With the 24-hour front desk, guests can enjoy Kraków's renowned night life.

name: Bogoria Residence by Loft Affair
description: Situated within 400 metres of Wawel Royal Castle and 400 metres of Town Hall Tower in the centre of Kraków, Bogoria Residence by Loft Affair features accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV. A fridge is also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a à la carte or a vegetarian breakfast. A terrace is available for guests at Bogoria Residence by Loft Affair to use. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Mary's Basilica, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 10 km from Bogoria Residence by Loft Affair, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Daisy Budget
description: This 1-star hotel is located 5 km from the Kraków’s beautiful and historic Old Town and features a swimming pool and a large spa bath at a surcharge. Its rooms come with free Wi-Fi. It also has its own ice rink and guests can borrow ice skates. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, which specialises in traditional Polish dishes. Guests can enjoy a barbecue in the garden. All rooms at the Hotel Daisy Budżet are classically furnished and come with a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a TV. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange an airport shuttle or organise a city tour. Guests can play table tennis or relax in a sauna. In winter, an ice rink is available. All these attractions are available at extra charge. Hotel Daisy Budżet is located in a quiet area of Kraków, just 7 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. Free parking is provided on site. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 5 km from Hotel Daisy Budżet.

name: Willawawel - Loftaffair Collection
description: Located in the centre of Kraków, 800 metres from Town Hall Tower and less than 1 km from Main Market Square, Willa Wawel by Loft Affair provides accommodation with free WiFi. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a stovetop. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Cloth Hall, National Museum of Krakow and Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from Willa Wawel by Loft Affair, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: City Express Hostel
description: Located in Kraków, 1.3 km from St. Mary's Basilica, Express Hostel offers an air-conditioned accommodation with a shared lounge and private parking. The property is around 1.8 km from Wawel Royal Castle, 2.2 km from Schindler Factory Museum and 1.2 km from Main Market Square. Some units are air-conditioned. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. Popular points of interest near Express Hostel include Lost Souls Alley, St. Florian's Gate and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 16,9 km from the accommodation.

name: 4Seasons Apartments Cracow
description: Located in the very heart of Kraków, just 750 metres from the Market Square, 4Seasons Apartments Cracow offers apartments with flat-screen TVs and kitchenettes with kitchenware. The apartments at 4Seasons have private bathrooms with either a bath or a shower, and most have balconies. The kitchenettes have refrigerators and electric kettles. All apartments have seating and dining areas. The property offers a common room with a kitchenette and a bathroom, which is available for guests upon request before check-in or after check-out. Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are both within 1.1 km of the apartments. Thanks to a good tram connection, guests can quickly get to Kraków's various points of interest, such as the Wawel Castle or the Kazimierz District.

name: Blue Swan
description: Peacefully situated near the Vistula River in the western suburb of Salwator, Blue Swan offers you comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi and uniquely designed interiors. This intimate property has a convenient location next to a main road. Some rooms have private balconies overlooking the river. Rooms are also equipped with en suite bathrooms with under floor heating and LCD TVs. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with ticket service to main city’s attractions. Guests can enjoy a drink on the terrace with a river view. The restaurant Fresco serves the variety of Italian and Polish dishes. Blue Swan is situated within a 20-minute walk from the Old Town. It offers convenient tram and bus connections with all parts of the city.

name: Pensjonat B&b Nad Rudawa
description: Only 4 km from the city centre, you can enjoy a good nights sleep at B&B Nad Rudawą in the tranquil residential area of Wola Justowska. This small B&B hotel has a cosy atmosphere and the helpful staff will make you feel at home. The comfortable rooms and studios are individually decorated and include free Wi-Fi. There is also free private parking on-site, and all room prices include a hearty Polish or continental breakfast with home baked bread. B&B Nad Rudawą is an ideal place for rest and relaxation. It is located right next to the Rudawa River and near lots of beautiful green areas, such as Decjusza Park. Kraków city centre and the main railway station can easily be reached by bus in 15 minutes, and the airport in Balice is only 10 km away. From October onwards guests will have the possibility to participate in yoga lessons held from Monday through to Thursday.

name: Fenna Apartments 7 minut od Rynku
description: Fenna Apartments 7 minut od Rynku provides accommodation with free WiFithroughout the property in the centre of Kraków, 500 metres from St. Florian's Gate. The property is close to Wawel Royal Castle, National Museum of Krakow and Town Hall Tower. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Krakow Central Railway Station. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer inner courtyard views. At the guest house each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Fenna Apartments 7 minut od Rynku include Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Saint Thomas Corner
description: Set in the centre of Kraków, Saint Thomas Corner has well-equipped accommodation boasting free WiFi, 300 metres from St. Florian's Gate and 1.1 km from Krakow Central Railway Station. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and Galeria Krakowska. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from Saint Thomas Corner, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: S18 Boutique Residence - Krakow Old Town
description: Situated in Kraków, 700 metres from St. Mary's Basilica and less than 1 km from Lost Souls Alley, S18 Boutique Residence - Krakow Old Town features city views and free WiFi. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge, an oven and dishwasher are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Wawel Royal Castle, St. Florian's Gate and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from S18 Boutique Residence - Krakow Old Town, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Meininger Kraków Centrum
description: Well set in Kraków, MEININGER Kraków Centrum provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is located 2.5 km from Schindler Factory Museum, 1.2 km from St. Florian's Gate and 1.2 km from Galeria Krakowska. Private parking is available on site. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also provide guests with a city view. At MEININGER Kraków Centrum every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking both English and Polish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near MEININGER Kraków Centrum include St. Mary's Basilica, Lost Souls Alley and Krakow Central Railway Station. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 25 km from the hostel.

name: Hotel J&J Sport Center
description: J&J Sport Center is situated in the outskirts of Kraków, 8 km from the city centre. Set in a quiet area, it offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Guests enjoy free access to a swimming pool, a hot tub, a sauna, a fitness centre and a tennis court. Aqua aerobic and boxing classes are also available. Guests are offered free advice from fitness trainers and dieticians, as well as a free swimming class. Each traditionally appointed room at the J&J includes private bathroom facilities with shower, as well as an LCD TV. There is also a work desk. The centre's restaurant offers both a buffet and à la carte meals. Guests can make reservations beforehand. J&J is located 500 metres from public transport stop and 9 km from Kraków's Main Train Station.

name: Kanonicza 22
description: Boasting prime location in the heart of the Kraków, Kanonicza 22 is a few steps from the city's main sights, such as Wawel Royal Castle, the Old Town and the historic Jewish quarter of Kazimierz. Situated on the city's oldest street, it offers accommodation in extra spacious luxurious apartments, each occupying a separate floor of a renovated historic townhouse, which features original historic elements such as a ceiling dating back to 1688. The elegant apartments at Kanonicza 22 feature individually designed interiors with unique furniture. They feature a air conditioning and a minibar. Each also comes with a coffee machine and an electric kettle. The bathrooms come with both a shower and a bathtub. You can enjoy city view from the rooms. Extras include satellite channels. At Kanonicza 22 you will find a 24-hour front desk and a bar. Other facilities like luggage storage are offered. There is an award-winning Polish restaurant, Pod Nosem, on the ground floor. Secured parking is available less than 350 metres from the property. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Adam Mickiewicz Monument (600 metres) and Town Hall Tower (600 metres).Krakow - Balice Airport is located 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Noclegi Czarna Perla
description: Czarna Perła is a motel located close to E7 road, connecting Cracow and Warsaw, 5 km from central Cracow. It offers rooms with a private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi. The motel has a free, secured car park, which makes it particularly convenient for guests travelling by car.

name: Hotel City Sm Business & Spa
description: Hotel City SM Business & SPA is located just 4 km from the Krakow city centre. It features an indoor pool and a wellness centre. The spa and wellness centre includes also a sauna, a steam room, a fitness room and a new Neogi Flamingo anti-ageing capsule. Guests are offered discounts in the wellness centre. Prior reservation is necessary and pool and wellness facilities are available at extra charge. This hotel offers you single, double and triple rooms with private bathrooms and free internet access. City SM Hotel also features a restaurant serving regional and international cuisine, and a café-bar with a lovely terrace in the garden. The surrounding area offers a convenient access to several main roads. Nearby attractions include the Sanctuary of Divine Mercy in the district of Lagiewniki, and just 500 metres away guests will find Zakopianka Shopping Centre.

name: Korona Guest Rooms
description: Pokoje Gościnne Korona is located only 850 metres from the lively Kazimierz district in Kraków and offers basic rooms with free Wi-Fi and private bathroom facilities. Each room at the Korona offers a TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower. Guests can benefit from a safety deposit box and a luggage storage room. The property offers a restaurant serving buffet meals, as well as a 24-hour front desk service. The Wawel Royal Castle is within a 20-minute walk. The Kraków Główny Train and Bus Station is 3 km away.

name: K4 Aparthotel Kraków
description: Featuring accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and flat-screen TV, K4 APARTHOTEL KRAKÓW is set a 9-minute walk from Cloth Hall and 700 metres from Adam Mickiewicz Monument. Private parking is available for an extra charge. The units come with a kitchen featuring refrigerator, kettle and a dining area, a living room with a sofa, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and shower. Some units feature a seating area. The aparthotel offers a continental or buffet breakfast served in a nearby restaurant. Guests can dine in the on-site restaurant, which serves a variety of Polish dishes and also offers gluten-free, vegan and vegetarian options. St. Mary's Basilica is an 11-minute walk from K4 APARTHOTEL KRAKÓW, while St. Florian's Gate is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Hello Aparthotels
description: HELLO Aparthotels offers accommodation set less than 1 km from the centre of Kraków and provides a garden and a terrace. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer, while the kitchenette features a fridge and a microwave. A balcony with garden views is offered in every unit. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 15 km from HELLO Aparthotels, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Playroom Aparthotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.1 km from the centre and 1.2 km from St. Mary's Basilica, PlayRoom Aparthotel features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Private parking is available on site. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Lost Souls Alley, Wawel Royal Castle and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from PlayRoom Aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Willa Julia
description: Located in Kraków, 2.2 km from Krakow Trade Fairs, Willa Julia boasts a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Enjoy a cup of tea while looking out at the river or garden. All rooms feature a private bathrooms. There is a shared kitchen at the property. A range of activities are offered in the area, such as cycling and hiking. Schindler Factory Museum is 5 km from Willa Julia, while Krakow Aqua Park is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Amber Hostel
description: Amber Hostel is located in central Kraków, less than 100 metres from Planty Park surrounding the Old Town, and 230 metres from Stary Kleparz Market. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms here feature a dining table and include bed linen. Bathroom facilities are either shared or private. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and luggage storage. The hostel is 400 metres from St. Florian's Gate, 500 metres from the Main Market Square and 650 metres from Galeria Krakowska and Kraków Główny Train Station. Krakow - Balice Airport is 12 km away.

name: Dom Turystyczny Indigo
description: Located in a post-communist part of Kraków, Nowa Huta, Dom Turystyczny Lipsk offers luggage storage. The Polish Aviation Museum is a 7-minute drive away. All rooms feature heating and the most have access to a shared bathroom and toilet. Other rooms also have a TV, desk and a private bathroom. Hairdryers and ironing facilities are available at reception. Guests can find restaurants within walking distance. Additional features include a large dining room, 3 conference rooms and free WiFi access in the public areas. Multikina Aquapark is only 3.3 km away and the Main Market Square is 7.5 km from the property. Kraków Arena is within a 10-minute drive, and the Czyżyny Shopping Centre is 500 metres away.

name: Greg&Tom Party Hostel
description: No description found

name: Arka Kraków
description: Arka Kraków is situated in Kraków, 2.5 km from Krakow Trade Fairs. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Laundry service is available. Buffet breakfast is served in the dining room. Laundry service is available. Buffet breakfast is served in the dining room. Krakow Aqua Park is 3 km from Arka Kraków, while Krakow Central Railway Station is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Oak Tree Old Town Apartments
description: Oak Tree Old Town Apartments has well-equipped accommodation featuring free WiFi in the centre of Kraków, 500 metres from Town Hall Tower and 500 metres from Main Market Square. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and free toiletries. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near Oak Tree Old Town Apartments include Cloth Hall, National Museum of Krakow and Marszałek Piłsudski Stadium. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Abella Suites & Apartments by Artery Hotels
description: Located in Kraków’s centre, only 550 metres from the Old Town, Abella Suites&Apartments by Artery offers accommodation with TV sets, private bathrooms and a free internet connection. The Abella is located in a 100-year old building. Its rooms feature a stylish and traditional interior design, characteristic for the late 19th century. All rooms and apartments are heated, and each private bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. The reception is open 24h and is located on the other side of the street, at ul. Długa 35. Breakfast is available at the restaurant in ul. Długa 37. The Old Town’s Main Market, which houses the Cloth Hall and St Mary’s Basilica, is a 11-minute walk away. Galeria Krakowska shopping centre is 850 metres away, and the main railway station is within 1 km. Bicycles can be rented on site.

name: Angel City Center Krakow Aparthotel
description: Offering a terrace and views of the city, Angel City Center Krakow Aparthotel is located in Kraków in the Lesser Poland Region, 600 metres from Galeria Krakowska. St. Florian's Gate is 700 metres from the property. Private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area and/or terrace. All units feature a kitchen fitted with a fridge and stovetop. Angel City Center Krakow Aparthotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Towels are provided. St. Mary's Basilica is 1 km from Angel City Center Krakow Aparthotel, while Cloth Hall is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Hotel Rok
description: Located in a green and quite part of Kraków, the ROK Hotel offers comfortably furnished rooms with a working space and a varied buffet breakfast served every morning. Guests of the ROK can relax in the TV lounge or enjoy a selection of Polish dishes served at the hotel bar. All rooms at the ROK Hotel come with a private bathroom with a shower. Each has a TV and a radio. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can store guests’ valuables in the hotel’s safety deposit box. The ROK is located 4 km from the historic Old Town with many restaurants and cafés. Private parking is available on site.
